96// cap JACK requirements to support arbitrarily large vehicles
97static double jack_quality( const vehicle &veh )
98{
99 const units::quantity<double, units::mass::unit_type> mass = std::min( veh.total_mass(),
100 JACK_LIMIT );
101 return std::ceil( mass / TOOL_LIFT_FACTOR );
102}

107 return pt.can_reload();

113player_activity veh_interact::serialize_activity()
114{
115 const auto *pt = sel_vehicle_part;
116 const auto *vp = sel_vpart_info;
117
118 if( sel_cmd == 'q' || sel_cmd == ' ' || !vp ) {
119 return player_activity();
120 }
121
122 int time = 1000;
123 switch( sel_cmd ) {
124 case 'i':
125 time = vp->install_time( g->u );
126 break;
127 case 'r':
128 if( pt != nullptr ) {
129 if( pt->is_broken() ) {
130 time = vp->install_time( g->u );
131 } else if( pt->base.max_damage() > 0 ) {
132 time = vp->repair_time( g->u ) * pt->base.damage() / pt->base.max_damage();
133 }
134 }
135 break;
136 case 'o':
137 time = vp->removal_time( g->u );
138 break;
139 default:
140 break;
141 }
142 if( g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) ) {
143 time = 1;
144 }
145 player_activity res( ACT_VEHICLE, time, static_cast<int>( sel_cmd ) );
146
147 // if we're working on an existing part, use that part as the reference point
148 // otherwise (e.g. installing a new frame), just use part 0
149 const tripoint q = g->m.getabs( veh->global_part_pos3( pt ? *pt : veh->part( 0 ) ) );
150 const vehicle_part *vpt = pt ? pt : &veh->part( 0 );
151 for( const tripoint &p : veh->get_points( true ) ) {
152 res.coord_set.insert( g->m.getabs( p ) );
153 }
154 res.values.push_back( q.x ); // values[0]
155 res.values.push_back( q.y ); // values[1]
156 res.values.push_back( dd.x ); // values[2]
157 res.values.push_back( dd.y ); // values[3]
158 res.values.push_back( -dd.x ); // values[4]
159 res.values.push_back( -dd.y ); // values[5]
160 res.values.push_back( veh->index_of_part( vpt ) ); // values[6]
161 res.values.push_back( q.z ); // values[7]
162 res.str_values.push_back( vp->get_id().str() );
163 res.targets.emplace_back( std::move( target ) );
164
165 return res;
166}

168player_activity veh_interact::run( vehicle &veh, point p )
169{
170 veh_interact vehint( veh, p );
171 vehint.do_main_loop();
172 return vehint.serialize_activity();
173}

175vehicle_part &veh_interact::select_part( const vehicle &veh, const part_selector &sel,
176 const std::string &title )
177{
178 static vehicle_part null_part;
179 vehicle_part *res = &null_part;
180
181 auto act = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
182 res = const_cast<vehicle_part *>( &pt );
183 };
184 std::function<bool( const vpart_reference & )> sel_wrapper = [sel]( const vpart_reference & vpr ) {
185 return sel( vpr.part() );
186 };
187
188 const vehicle_part_range vpr = veh.get_all_parts();
189 int opts = std::count_if( vpr.begin(), vpr.end(), sel_wrapper );
190
191 if( opts == 1 ) {
192 act( std::find_if( vpr.begin(), vpr.end(), sel_wrapper )->part() );
193
194 } else if( opts != 0 ) {
195 veh_interact vehint( const_cast<vehicle &>( veh ) );
196 vehint.title = title.empty() ? _( "Select part" ) : title;
197 vehint.overview( sel, act );
198 }
199
200 return *res;
201}

203/**
204 * Creates a blank veh_interact window.
205 */
206veh_interact::veh_interact( vehicle &veh, point p )
207 : dd( p ), veh( &veh ), main_context( "VEH_INTERACT" )
208{
209 // Only build the shapes map and the wheel list once
210 for( const auto &e : vpart_info::all() ) {
211 const vpart_info &vp = e.second;
212 vpart_shapes[ vp.name() + vp.item.str() ].push_back( &vp );
213 if( vp.has_flag( "WHEEL" ) ) {
214 wheel_types.push_back( &vp );
215 }
216 }
217
218 main_context.register_directions();
219 main_context.register_action( "QUIT" );
220 main_context.register_action( "INSTALL" );
221 main_context.register_action( "REPAIR" );
222 main_context.register_action( "MEND" );
223 main_context.register_action( "REFILL" );
224 main_context.register_action( "REMOVE" );
225 main_context.register_action( "RENAME" );
226 main_context.register_action( "SIPHON" );
227 main_context.register_action( "UNLOAD" );
228 main_context.register_action( "ASSIGN_CREW" );
229 main_context.register_action( "CHANGE_SHAPE" );
230 main_context.register_action( "RELABEL" );
231 main_context.register_action( "PREV_TAB" );
232 main_context.register_action( "NEXT_TAB" );
233 main_context.register_action( "OVERVIEW_DOWN" );
234 main_context.register_action( "OVERVIEW_UP" );
235 main_context.register_action( "FUEL_LIST_DOWN" );
236 main_context.register_action( "FUEL_LIST_UP" );
237 main_context.register_action( "DESC_LIST_DOWN" );
238 main_context.register_action( "DESC_LIST_UP" );
239 main_context.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
240 main_context.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
241 main_context.register_action( "FILTER" );
242 main_context.register_action( "ANY_INPUT" );
243
244 count_durability();
245 cache_tool_availability();
246 // Initialize info of selected parts
247 move_cursor( point_zero );
248}

252void veh_interact::allocate_windows()
253{
254 // grid window
255 const point grid( point_south_east );
256 const int grid_w = TERMX - 2; // exterior borders take 2
257 const int grid_h = TERMY - 2; // exterior borders take 2
258
259 const int mode_h = 1;
260 const int name_h = 1;
261
262 page_size = grid_h - ( mode_h + stats_h + name_h ) - 2;
263
264 const int pane_y = grid.y + mode_h + 1;
265
266 const int pane_w = ( grid_w / 3 ) - 1;
267
268 const int disp_w = grid_w - ( pane_w * 2 ) - 2;
269 const int disp_h = page_size * 0.45;
270 const int parts_h = page_size - disp_h;
271 const int parts_y = pane_y + disp_h;
272
273 const int name_y = pane_y + page_size + 1;
274 const int stats_y = name_y + name_h;
275
276 const int list_x = grid.x + disp_w + 1;
277 const int msg_x = list_x + pane_w + 1;
278
279 // covers right part of w_name and w_stats in vertical/hybrid
280 const int details_y = name_y;
281 const int details_x = list_x;
282
283 const int details_h = 7;
284 const int details_w = grid.x + grid_w - details_x;
285
286 // make the windows
287 w_border = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
288 w_mode = catacurses::newwin( mode_h, grid_w, grid );
289 w_msg = catacurses::newwin( page_size, pane_w, point( msg_x, pane_y ) );
290 w_disp = catacurses::newwin( disp_h, disp_w, point( grid.x, pane_y ) );
291 w_parts = catacurses::newwin( parts_h, disp_w, point( grid.x, parts_y ) );
292 w_list = catacurses::newwin( page_size, pane_w, point( list_x, pane_y ) );
293 w_stats = catacurses::newwin( stats_h, grid_w, point( grid.x, stats_y ) );
294 w_name = catacurses::newwin( name_h, grid_w, point( grid.x, name_y ) );
295 w_details = catacurses::newwin( details_h, details_w, point( details_x, details_y ) );
296}

298bool veh_interact::format_reqs( std::string &msg, const requirement_data &reqs,
299 const std::map<skill_id, int> &skills, int moves ) const
300{
301 const inventory &inv = g->u.crafting_inventory();
302 bool ok = reqs.can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component );
303
304 msg += _( "<color_white>Time required:</color>\n" );
305 // TODO: better have a from_moves function
306 msg += "> " + to_string_approx( time_duration::from_turns( moves / 100 ) ) + "\n";
307
308 msg += _( "<color_white>Skills required:</color>\n" );
309 for( const auto &e : skills ) {
310 bool hasSkill = g->u.get_skill_level( e.first ) >= e.second;
311 if( !hasSkill ) {
312 ok = false;
313 }
314 //~ %1$s represents the internal color name which shouldn't be translated, %2$s is skill name, and %3$i is skill level
315 msg += string_format( _( "> %1$s%2$s %3$i</color>\n" ), status_color( hasSkill ),
316 e.first.obj().name(), e.second );
317 }
318 if( skills.empty() ) {
319 //~ %1$s represents the internal color name which shouldn't be translated, %2$s is the word "NONE"
320 msg += string_format( "> %1$s%2$s</color>", status_color( true ), _( "NONE" ) ) + "\n";
321 }
322
323 auto comps = reqs.get_folded_components_list( getmaxx( w_msg ) - 2, c_white, inv,
324 is_crafting_component );
325 for( const std::string &line : comps ) {
326 msg += line + "\n";
327 }
328 auto tools = reqs.get_folded_tools_list( getmaxx( w_msg ) - 2, c_white, inv );
329 for( const std::string &line : tools ) {
330 msg += line + "\n";
331 }
332
333 return ok;
334}

344shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> veh_interact::create_or_get_ui_adaptor()
345{
346 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = ui.lock();
347 if( !current_ui ) {
348 ui = current_ui = make_shared_fast<ui_adaptor>();
349 current_ui->on_screen_resize( [this]( ui_adaptor & current_ui ) {
350 if( ui_hidden ) {
351 current_ui.position( point_zero, point_zero );
352 return;
353 }
354 allocate_windows();
355 current_ui.position_from_window( catacurses::stdscr );
356 } );
357 current_ui->mark_resize();
358 current_ui->on_redraw( [this]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
359 if( ui_hidden ) {
360 return;
361 }
362 display_grid();
363 display_name();
364 display_stats();
365 display_veh();
366
367 werase( w_parts );
368 veh->print_part_list( w_parts, 0, getmaxy( w_parts ) - 1, getmaxx( w_parts ), cpart, highlight_part,
369 true );
370 wnoutrefresh( w_parts );
371
372 werase( w_msg );
373 if( !msg.has_value() ) {
374 veh->print_vparts_descs( w_msg, getmaxy( w_msg ), getmaxx( w_msg ), cpart, start_at, start_limit );
375 } else {
376 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-use-named-point-constants)
377 fold_and_print( w_msg, point( 1, 0 ), getmaxx( w_msg ) - 2, c_light_red, msg.value() );
378 }
379 wnoutrefresh( w_msg );
380
381 if( install_info ) {
382 display_list( install_info->pos, install_info->tab_vparts, 2 );
383 display_details( sel_vpart_info );
384 } else {
385 display_overview();
386 }
387 display_mode();
388 } );
389 }
390 return current_ui;
391}

397 create_or_get_ui_adaptor()->mark_resize();

401void veh_interact::do_main_loop()
402{
403 avatar &you = get_avatar();
404 bool finish = false;
405 const bool owned_by_player = veh->handle_potential_theft( you, true );
406 faction *owner_fac;
407 if( veh->has_owner() ) {
408 owner_fac = g->faction_manager_ptr->get( veh->get_owner() );
409 } else {
410 owner_fac = g->faction_manager_ptr->get( faction_id( "no_faction" ) );
411 }
412
413 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
414
415 while( !finish ) {
416 calc_overview();
417 ui_manager::redraw();
418 const std::string action = main_context.handle_input();
419 msg.reset();
420 if( const cata::optional<tripoint> vec = main_context.get_direction( action ) ) {
421 move_cursor( vec->xy() );
422 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
423 finish = true;
424 } else if( action == "INSTALL" ) {
425 if( veh->handle_potential_theft( you ) ) {
426 do_install();
427 }
428 } else if( action == "REPAIR" ) {
429 if( veh->handle_potential_theft( you ) ) {
430 do_repair();
431 }
432 } else if( action == "MEND" ) {
433 if( veh->handle_potential_theft( you ) ) {
434 do_mend();
435 }
436 } else if( action == "REFILL" ) {
437 if( veh->handle_potential_theft( you ) ) {
438 do_refill();
439 }
440 } else if( action == "REMOVE" ) {
441 if( veh->handle_potential_theft( you ) ) {
442 do_remove();
443 }
444 } else if( action == "RENAME" ) {
445 if( owned_by_player ) {
446 do_rename();
447 } else {
448 if( owner_fac ) {
449 popup( _( "You cannot rename this vehicle as it is owned by: %s." ), _( owner_fac->name ) );
450 }
451 }
452 } else if( action == "SIPHON" ) {
453 if( veh->handle_potential_theft( you ) ) {
454 do_siphon();
455 // Siphoning may have started a player activity. If so, we should close the
456 // vehicle dialog and continue with the activity.
457 finish = !g->u.activity.is_null();
458 if( !finish ) {
459 // it's possible we just invalidated our crafting inventory
460 cache_tool_availability();
461 }
462 }
463 } else if( action == "UNLOAD" ) {
464 if( veh->handle_potential_theft( you ) ) {
465 finish = do_unload();
466 }
467 } else if( action == "CHANGE_SHAPE" ) {
468 // purely cosmetic
469 do_change_shape();
470 } else if( action == "ASSIGN_CREW" ) {
471 if( owned_by_player ) {
472 do_assign_crew();
473 } else {
474 if( owner_fac ) {
475 popup( _( "You cannot assign crew on this vehicle as it is owned by: %s." ),
476 _( owner_fac->name ) );
477 }
478 }
479 } else if( action == "RELABEL" ) {
480 if( owned_by_player ) {
481 do_relabel();
482 } else {
483 if( owner_fac ) {
484 popup( _( "You cannot relabel this vehicle as it is owned by: %s." ), _( owner_fac->name ) );
485 }
486 }
487 } else if( action == "FUEL_LIST_DOWN" ) {
488 move_fuel_cursor( 1 );
489 } else if( action == "FUEL_LIST_UP" ) {
490 move_fuel_cursor( -1 );
491 } else if( action == "OVERVIEW_DOWN" ) {
492 move_overview_line( 1 );
493 } else if( action == "OVERVIEW_UP" ) {
494 move_overview_line( -1 );
495 } else if( action == "DESC_LIST_DOWN" ) {
496 move_cursor( point_zero, 1 );
497 } else if( action == "DESC_LIST_UP" ) {
498 move_cursor( point_zero, -1 );
499 }
500 if( sel_cmd != ' ' ) {
501 finish = true;
502 }
503 }
504}
505
506void veh_interact::cache_tool_availability()
507{
508 crafting_inv = g->u.crafting_inventory();
509
510 cache_tool_availability_update_lifting( g->u.pos() );
511 int mech_jack = 0;
512 if( g->u.is_mounted() ) {
513 mech_jack = g->u.mounted_creature->mech_str_addition() + 10;
514 }
515 max_jack = std::max( { g->u.max_quality( qual_JACK ), mech_jack,
516 map_selector( g->u.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE, false ).max_quality( qual_JACK ),
517 vehicle_selector( g->u.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE, false, *veh ).max_quality( qual_JACK )
518 } );
519}
520
521void veh_interact::cache_tool_availability_update_lifting( const tripoint &world_cursor_pos )
522{
523 max_lift = g->u.best_nearby_lifting_assist( world_cursor_pos );
524}

526/**
527 * Checks if the player is able to perform some command, and returns a nonzero
528 * error code if they are unable to perform it. The return from this function
529 * should be passed into the various do_whatever functions further down.
530 * @param mode The command the player is trying to perform (i.e. 'r' for repair).
531 * @return CAN_DO if the player has everything they need,
532 * INVALID_TARGET if the command can't target that square,
533 * LACK_TOOLS if the player lacks tools,
534 * NOT_FREE if something else obstructs the action,
535 * LACK_SKILL if the player's skill isn't high enough,
536 * LOW_MORALE if the player's morale is too low while trying to perform
537 * an action requiring a minimum morale,
538 * UNKNOWN_TASK if the requested operation is unrecognized.
539 */
540task_reason veh_interact::cant_do( char mode )
541{
542 const avatar &you = get_avatar();
543 bool enough_morale = true;
544 bool valid_target = false;
545 bool has_tools = false;
546 bool part_free = true;
547 bool has_skill = true;
548 bool enough_light = true;
549 const vehicle_part_range vpr = veh->get_all_parts();
550 switch( mode ) {
551 case 'i':
552 // install mode
553 enough_morale = you.has_morale_to_craft();
554 valid_target = !can_mount.empty() && 0 == veh->tags.count( "convertible" );
555 //tool checks processed later
556 enough_light = character_funcs::can_see_fine_details( you );
557 has_tools = true;
558 break;
559
560 case 'r':
561 // repair mode
562 enough_morale = you.has_morale_to_craft();
563 valid_target = !need_repair.empty() && cpart >= 0;
564 // checked later
565 has_tools = true;
566 enough_light = character_funcs::can_see_fine_details( you );
567 break;
568
569 case 'm': {
570 // mend mode
571 enough_morale = you.has_morale_to_craft();
572 const bool toggling = you.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS );
573 valid_target = std::any_of( vpr.begin(), vpr.end(), [toggling]( const vpart_reference & pt ) {
574 if( toggling ) {
575 return pt.part().is_available() && !pt.part().faults_potential().empty();
576 } else {
577 return pt.part().is_available() && !pt.part().faults().empty();
578 }
579 } );
580 enough_light = character_funcs::can_see_fine_details( you );
581 // checked later
582 has_tools = true;
583 }
584 break;
585
586 case 'f':
587 valid_target = std::any_of( vpr.begin(), vpr.end(), []( const vpart_reference & pt ) {
588 return can_refill( pt.part() );
589 } );
590 has_tools = true;
591 break;
592
593 case 'o':
594 // remove mode
595 enough_morale = you.has_morale_to_craft();
596 valid_target = cpart >= 0 && 0 == veh->tags.count( "convertible" );
597 part_free = parts_here.size() > 1 || ( cpart >= 0 && veh->can_unmount( cpart ) );
598 //tool and skill checks processed later
599 has_tools = true;
600 has_skill = true;
601 enough_light = character_funcs::can_see_fine_details( you );
602 break;
603
604 case 's':
605 // siphon mode
606 valid_target = false;
607 for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh->get_any_parts( VPFLAG_FLUIDTANK ) ) {
608 if( vp.part().base.contents_made_of( LIQUID ) ) {
609 valid_target = true;
610 break;
611 }
612 }
613 has_tools = you.has_quality( qual_HOSE );
614 break;
615
616 case 'd':
617 // unload mode
618 valid_target = false;
619 has_tools = true;
620 for( auto &e : veh->fuels_left() ) {
621 if( e.first != fuel_type_battery && e.first->phase == SOLID ) {
622 valid_target = true;
623 break;
624 }
625 }
626 break;
627
628 case 'w':
629 // assign crew
630 if( g->allies().empty() ) {
631 return INVALID_TARGET;
632 }
633 return std::any_of( vpr.begin(), vpr.end(), []( const vpart_reference & e ) {
634 return e.part().is_seat();
635 } ) ? CAN_DO : INVALID_TARGET;
636
637 case 'p': {
638 // Change part shape
639 has_tools = true;
640
641 if( cpart >= 0 ) {
642 const int displayed_part = veh->part_displayed_at( veh->part( cpart ).mount );
643 const vpart_info &displayed_vpart = veh->part( displayed_part ).info();
644 // Does the displayed part have different shapes?
645 valid_target = vpart_shapes[displayed_vpart.name() + displayed_vpart.item.str()].size() > 1;
646 }
647 break;
648 }
649 case 'a':
650 // relabel
651 valid_target = cpart >= 0;
652 has_tools = true;
653 break;
654 default:
655 return UNKNOWN_TASK;
656 }
657
658 if( std::abs( veh->velocity ) > 100 || you.controlling_vehicle ) {
659 return MOVING_VEHICLE;
660 }
661 if( !valid_target ) {
662 return INVALID_TARGET;
663 }
664 if( !enough_morale ) {
665 return LOW_MORALE;
666 }
667 if( !enough_light ) {
668 return LOW_LIGHT;
669 }
670 if( !has_tools ) {
671 return LACK_TOOLS;
672 }
673 if( !part_free ) {
674 return NOT_FREE;
675 }
676 // TODO: that is always false!
677 if( !has_skill ) {
678 return LACK_SKILL;
679 }
680 return CAN_DO;
681}
682
683bool veh_interact::is_drive_conflict()
684{
685 std::string conflict_type;
686 bool has_conflict = veh->has_engine_conflict( sel_vpart_info, conflict_type );
687
688 if( has_conflict ) {
689 //~ %1$s is fuel_type
690 msg = string_format( _( "Only one %1$s powered engine can be installed." ),
691 conflict_type );
692 }
693 return has_conflict;
694}
695
696bool veh_interact::can_self_jack()
697{
698 int lvl = jack_quality( *veh );
699
700 for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh->get_avail_parts( "SELF_JACK" ) ) {
701 if( vp.part().base.has_quality( qual_SELF_JACK, lvl ) ) {
702 return true;
703 }
704 }
705 return false;
706}
707
708bool veh_interact::update_part_requirements()
709{
710 if( sel_vpart_info == nullptr ) {
711 return false;
712 }
713
714 if( is_drive_conflict() ) {
715 return false;
716 }
717 if( sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "FUNNEL" ) ) {
718 if( std::none_of( parts_here.begin(), parts_here.end(), [&]( const int e ) {
719 return veh->part( e ).is_tank();
720 } ) ) {
721 msg = _( "Funnels need to be installed over a tank." );
722 return false;
723 }
724 }
725
726 if( sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "TURRET" ) ) {
727 if( std::any_of( parts_here.begin(), parts_here.end(), [&]( const int e ) {
728 return veh->part( e ).is_turret();
729 } ) ) {
730 msg = _( "Can't install turret on another turret." );
731 return false;
732 }
733 }
734
735 const auto get_rq_mechanics = []( const vpart_info & vpi ) {
736 for( const std::pair<const skill_id, int> &it : vpi.install_skills ) {
737 if( it.first == skill_mechanics ) {
738 return it.second;
739 }
740 }
741 return 0;
742 };
743
744 // Difficulty of installing additional engines depends on most complex
745 // installed engine and # of installed engines,
746 // but can never be less than 6 or more than 10.
747 // Engines without E_HIGHER_SKILL flag are excluded from the check.
748 bool is_engine = sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "ENGINE" );
749 int dif_eng = 0;
750 if( is_engine && sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "E_HIGHER_SKILL" ) ) {
751 int engines = 0;
752 int dif_max = get_rq_mechanics( *sel_vpart_info );
753 for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh->get_avail_parts( "ENGINE" ) ) {
754 if( vp.has_feature( "E_HIGHER_SKILL" ) ) {
755 engines++;
756 dif_max = std::max( dif_max, get_rq_mechanics( vp.info() ) );
757 }
758 }
759 if( engines > 0 ) {
760 int lvl = std::max( 6, dif_max + 3 );
761 dif_eng = std::min( 10, lvl + ( engines - 1 ) * 2 );
762 }
763 }
764
765 int dif_steering = 0;
766 if( sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "STEERABLE" ) ) {
767 std::set<int> axles;
768 for( auto &p : veh->steering ) {
769 if( !veh->part_flag( p, "TRACKED" ) ) {
770 // tracked parts don't contribute to axle complexity
771 axles.insert( veh->part( p ).mount.x );
772 }
773 }
774
775 if( !axles.empty() && axles.count( -dd.x ) == 0 ) {
776 // Installing more than one steerable axle is hard
777 // (but adding a wheel to an existing axle isn't)
778 dif_steering = axles.size() + 5;
779 }
780 }
781
782 const auto reqs = sel_vpart_info->install_requirements();
783
784 Character &you = get_player_character();
785 std::string nmsg;
786 bool ok = format_reqs( nmsg, reqs, sel_vpart_info->install_skills,
787 sel_vpart_info->install_time( *you.as_player() ) );
788
789 std::string additional_requirements;
790 bool lifting_or_jacking_required = false;
791
792 if( dif_eng > 0 ) {
793 if( you.get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) < dif_eng ) {
794 ok = false;
795 }
796 additional_requirements += string_format(
797 //~ %1$s represents the internal color name which shouldn't be translated,
798 //~ %2$s is skill name, and %3$i is skill level
799 _( "> %1$s%2$s %3$i</color> to install alongside other engines." ),
800 status_color( you.get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) >= dif_eng ),
801 skill_mechanics.obj().name(), dif_eng ) + "\n";
802 }
803
804 if( dif_steering > 0 ) {
805 if( you.get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) < dif_steering ) {
806 ok = false;
807 }
808 //~ %1$s represents the internal color name which shouldn't be translated, %2$s is skill name, and %3$i is skill level
809 additional_requirements += string_format( _( "> %1$s%2$s %3$i</color> for extra steering axles." ),
810 status_color( you.get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) >= dif_steering ),
811 skill_mechanics.obj().name(), dif_steering ) + "\n";
812 }
813
814 int lvl = 0;
815 int str = 0;
816 quality_id qual;
817 bool use_aid = false;
818 bool use_str = false;
819 item base( sel_vpart_info->item );
820 if( sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "NEEDS_JACKING" ) ) {
821 lifting_or_jacking_required = true;
822 qual = qual_JACK;
823 lvl = jack_quality( *veh );
824 str = veh->lift_strength();
825 use_aid = ( max_jack >= lvl ) || can_self_jack();
826 use_str = character_funcs::can_lift_with_helpers( you, str );
827 } else if( get_option<bool>( "DISABLE_LIFTING" ) || sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "NO_LIFT_REQ" ) ) {
828 use_aid = true;
829 use_str = true;
830 } else {
831 lifting_or_jacking_required = true;
832 qual = qual_LIFT;
833 lvl = std::ceil( units::quantity<double, units::mass::unit_type>( base.weight() ) /
834 TOOL_LIFT_FACTOR );
835 str = base.lift_strength();
836 use_aid = max_lift >= lvl;
837 use_str = character_funcs::can_lift_with_helpers( you, base.lift_strength() );
838 }
839
840 if( !( use_aid || use_str ) ) {
841 ok = false;
842 }
843
844 nc_color aid_color = use_aid ? c_green : ( use_str ? c_dark_gray : c_red );
845 nc_color str_color = use_str ? c_green : ( use_aid ? c_dark_gray : c_red );
846
847 const auto helpers = character_funcs::get_crafting_helpers( you );
848 std::string str_string;
849 if( lifting_or_jacking_required ) {
850 if( !helpers.empty() ) {
851 str_string = string_format( _( "strength ( assisted ) %d" ), str );
852 } else {
853 str_string = string_format( _( "strength %d" ), str );
854 }
855
856 //~ %1$s is quality name, %2$d is quality level
857 std::string aid_string = string_format( _( "1 tool with %1$s %2$d" ),
858 qual.obj().name, lvl );
859 additional_requirements += string_format( _( "> %1$s <color_white>OR</color> %2$s" ),
860 colorize( aid_string, aid_color ),
861 colorize( str_string, str_color ) ) + "\n";
862 }
863 if( !additional_requirements.empty() ) {
864 nmsg += _( "<color_white>Additional requirements:</color>\n" );
865 nmsg += additional_requirements;
866 }
867
868 sel_vpart_info->format_description( nmsg, c_light_gray, getmaxx( w_msg ) - 4 );
869
870 msg = colorize( nmsg, c_light_gray );
871 return ok || you.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS );
872}
873
874/**
875 * Moves list of fuels up or down.
876 * @param delta -1 if moving up,
877 * 1 if moving down
878 */
879void veh_interact::move_fuel_cursor( int delta )
880{
881 int max_fuel_indicators = static_cast<int>( veh->get_printable_fuel_types().size() );
882 int height = 5;
883 fuel_index += delta;
884
885 if( fuel_index < 0 ) {
886 fuel_index = 0;
887 } else if( fuel_index > max_fuel_indicators - height ) {
888 fuel_index = std::max( max_fuel_indicators - height, 0 );
889 }
890}
891
892static void sort_uilist_entries_by_line_drawing( std::vector<uilist_entry> &shape_ui_entries )
893{
894 // An ordering of the line drawing symbols that does not result in
895 // connecting when placed adjacent to each other vertically.
896 const static std::map<int, int> symbol_order = {
897 { LINE_XOXO, 0 }, { LINE_OXOX, 1 },
898 { LINE_XOOX, 2 }, { LINE_XXOO, 3 },
899 { LINE_XXXX, 4 }, { LINE_OXXO, 5 },
900 { LINE_OOXX, 6 }
901 };
902
903 std::sort( shape_ui_entries.begin(), shape_ui_entries.end(),
904 []( const uilist_entry & a, const uilist_entry & b ) {
905 auto a_iter = symbol_order.find( a.extratxt.sym );
906 auto b_iter = symbol_order.find( b.extratxt.sym );
907 if( a_iter != symbol_order.end() ) {
908 if( b_iter != symbol_order.end() ) {
909 return a_iter->second < b_iter->second;
910 } else {
911 return true;
912 }
913 } else if( b_iter != symbol_order.end() ) {
914 return false;
915 } else {
916 return a.extratxt.sym < b.extratxt.sym;
917 }
918 } );
919}
920
921void veh_interact::do_install()
922{
923 task_reason reason = cant_do( 'i' );
924
925 if( reason == INVALID_TARGET ) {
926 msg = _( "Cannot install any part here." );
927 return;
928 }
929
930 restore_on_out_of_scope<cata::optional<std::string>> prev_title( title );
931 title = _( "Choose new part to install here:" );
932
933 restore_on_out_of_scope<std::unique_ptr<install_info_t>> prev_install_info( std::move(
934 install_info ) );
935 install_info = std::make_unique<install_info_t>();
936
937 std::array<std::string, 8> &tab_list = install_info->tab_list = { {
938 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "All" ),
939 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "Cargo" ),
940 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "Light" ),
941 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "Util" ),
942 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "Hull" ),
943 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "Internal" ),
944 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "Other" ),
945 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "Filter" )
946 }
947 };
948
949 install_info->tab_list_short = { {
950 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "A" ),
951 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "C" ),
952 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "L" ),
953 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "U" ),
954 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "H" ),
955 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "I" ),
956 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "O" ),
957 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "F" )
958 }
959 };
960
961 std::array <std::function<bool( const vpart_info * )>, 8>
962 tab_filters; // filter for each tab, last one
963 tab_filters[0] = [&]( const vpart_info * ) {
964 return true;
965 }; // All
966 tab_filters[1] = [&]( const vpart_info * p ) {
967 auto &part = *p;
968 return part.has_flag( VPFLAG_CARGO ) && // Cargo
969 !part.has_flag( "TURRET" );
970 };
971 tab_filters[2] = [&]( const vpart_info * p ) {
972 auto &part = *p;
973 return part.has_flag( VPFLAG_LIGHT ) || // Light
974 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_CONE_LIGHT ) ||
975 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_WIDE_CONE_LIGHT ) ||
976 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_CIRCLE_LIGHT ) ||
977 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_DOME_LIGHT ) ||
978 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_AISLE_LIGHT ) ||
979 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_ATOMIC_LIGHT );
980 };
981 tab_filters[3] = [&]( const vpart_info * p ) {
982 auto &part = *p;
983 return part.has_flag( "TRACK" ) || //Util
984 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_FRIDGE ) ||
985 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_FREEZER ) ||
986 part.has_flag( "KITCHEN" ) ||
987 part.has_flag( "WELDRIG" ) ||
988 part.has_flag( "CRAFTRIG" ) ||
989 part.has_flag( "CHEMLAB" ) ||
990 part.has_flag( "FORGE" ) ||
991 part.has_flag( "HORN" ) ||
992 part.has_flag( "BEEPER" ) ||
993 part.has_flag( "AUTOPILOT" ) ||
994 part.has_flag( "WATCH" ) ||
995 part.has_flag( "ALARMCLOCK" ) ||
996 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_RECHARGE ) ||
997 part.has_flag( "VISION" ) ||
998 part.has_flag( "POWER_TRANSFER" ) ||
999 part.has_flag( "FAUCET" ) ||
1000 part.has_flag( "STEREO" ) ||
1001 part.has_flag( "CHIMES" ) ||
1002 part.has_flag( "MUFFLER" ) ||
1003 part.has_flag( "REMOTE_CONTROLS" ) ||
1004 part.has_flag( "CURTAIN" ) ||
1005 part.has_flag( "SEATBELT" ) ||
1006 part.has_flag( "SECURITY" ) ||
1007 part.has_flag( "SEAT" ) ||
1008 part.has_flag( "BED" ) ||
1009 part.has_flag( "SPACE_HEATER" ) ||
1010 part.has_flag( "COOLER" ) ||
1011 part.has_flag( "DOOR_MOTOR" ) ||
1012 part.has_flag( "WATER_PURIFIER" ) ||
1013 part.has_flag( "WORKBENCH" );
1014 };
1015 tab_filters[4] = [&]( const vpart_info * p ) {
1016 auto &part = *p;
1017 return( part.has_flag( VPFLAG_OBSTACLE ) || // Hull
1018 part.has_flag( "ROOF" ) ||
1019 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_ARMOR ) ) &&
1020 !part.has_flag( "WHEEL" ) &&
1021 !tab_filters[3]( p );
1022 };
1023 tab_filters[5] = [&]( const vpart_info * p ) {
1024 auto &part = *p;
1025 return part.has_flag( VPFLAG_ENGINE ) || // Internals
1026 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_ALTERNATOR ) ||
1027 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_CONTROLS ) ||
1028 part.location == "fuel_source" ||
1029 part.location == "on_battery_mount" ||
1030 ( part.location.empty() && part.has_flag( "FUEL_TANK" ) );
1031 };
1032
1033 // Other: everything that's not in the other filters
1034 tab_filters[tab_filters.size() - 2] = [&]( const vpart_info * part ) {
1035 for( size_t i = 1; i < tab_filters.size() - 2; i++ ) {
1036 if( tab_filters[i]( part ) ) {
1037 return false;
1038 }
1039 }
1040 return true;
1041 };
1042
1043 std::string filter; // The user specified filter
1044 tab_filters[7] = [&]( const vpart_info * p ) {
1045 return lcmatch( p->name(), filter );
1046 };
1047
1048 // full list of mountable parts, to be filtered according to tab
1049 std::vector<const vpart_info *> &tab_vparts = install_info->tab_vparts = can_mount;
1050
1051 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
1052
1053 int &pos = install_info->pos = 0;
1054 size_t &tab = install_info->tab = 0;
1055
1056 while( true ) {
1057 sel_vpart_info = tab_vparts.empty() ? nullptr : tab_vparts[pos]; // filtered list can be empty
1058
1059 bool can_install = update_part_requirements();
1060
1061 ui_manager::redraw();
1062
1063 const std::string action = main_context.handle_input();
1064 msg.reset();
1065 if( action == "FILTER" ) {
1066 string_input_popup()
1067 .title( _( "Search for part" ) )
1068 .width( 50 )
1069 .description( _( "Filter" ) )
1070 .max_length( 100 )
1071 .edit( filter );
1072 tab = 7; // Move to the user filter tab.
1073 }
1074 if( action == "REPAIR" ) {
1075 filter.clear();
1076 tab = 0;
1077 }
1078 if( action == "INSTALL" || action == "CONFIRM" ) {
1079 if( can_install ) {
1080 switch( reason ) {
1081 case LOW_MORALE:
1082 msg = _( "Your morale is too low to construct" );
1083 return;
1084 case LOW_LIGHT:
1085 msg = _( "It's too dark to see what you are doing" );
1086 return;
1087 case MOVING_VEHICLE:
1088 msg = _( "You can't install parts while driving." );
1089 return;
1090 default:
1091 break;
1092 }
1093 if( veh->is_foldable() && !sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "FOLDABLE" ) &&
1094 !query_yn( _( "Installing this part will make the vehicle unfoldable. Continue?" ) ) ) {
1095 return;
1096 }
1097 const auto &shapes =
1098 vpart_shapes[ sel_vpart_info->name() + sel_vpart_info->item.str() ];
1099 int selected_shape = -1;
1100 if( shapes.size() > 1 ) { // more than one shape available, display selection
1101 std::vector<uilist_entry> shape_ui_entries;
1102 for( size_t i = 0; i < shapes.size(); i++ ) {
1103 uilist_entry entry( i, true, 0, shapes[i]->name() );
1104 entry.extratxt.left = 1;
1105 entry.extratxt.sym = special_symbol( shapes[i]->sym );
1106 entry.extratxt.color = shapes[i]->color;
1107 shape_ui_entries.push_back( entry );
1108 }
1109 sort_uilist_entries_by_line_drawing( shape_ui_entries );
1110 uilist smenu;
1111 smenu.settext( _( "Choose shape:" ) );
1112 smenu.entries = shape_ui_entries;
1113 smenu.w_width_setup = [this]() {
1114 return getmaxx( w_list );
1115 };
1116 smenu.w_x_setup = [this]( const int ) {
1117 return getbegx( w_list );
1118 };
1119 smenu.w_y_setup = [this]( const int ) {
1120 return getbegy( w_list );
1121 };
1122 smenu.query();
1123 selected_shape = smenu.ret;
1124 } else { // only one shape available, default to first one
1125 selected_shape = 0;
1126 }
1127 if( selected_shape >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( selected_shape ) < shapes.size() ) {
1128 sel_vpart_info = shapes[selected_shape];
1129 sel_cmd = 'i';
1130 return;
1131 }
1132 }
1133 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
1134 sel_vpart_info = nullptr;
1135 break;
1136 } else if( action == "PREV_TAB" || action == "NEXT_TAB" || action == "FILTER" ||
1137 action == "REPAIR" ) {
1138 tab_vparts.clear();
1139 pos = 0;
1140
1141 if( action == "PREV_TAB" ) {
1142 tab = ( tab < 1 ) ? tab_list.size() - 1 : tab - 1;
1143 } else if( action == "NEXT_TAB" ) {
1144 tab = ( tab < tab_list.size() - 1 ) ? tab + 1 : 0;
1145 }
1146
1147 copy_if( can_mount.begin(), can_mount.end(), back_inserter( tab_vparts ), tab_filters[tab] );
1148 } else {
1149 move_in_list( pos, action, tab_vparts.size(), 2 );
1150 }
1151 }
1152}
1153
1154bool veh_interact::move_in_list( int &pos, const std::string &action, const int size,
1155 const int header ) const
1156{
1157 int lines_per_page = page_size - header;
1158 if( action == "PREV_TAB" || action == "LEFT" ) {
1159 pos -= lines_per_page;
1160 } else if( action == "NEXT_TAB" || action == "RIGHT" ) {
1161 pos += lines_per_page;
1162 } else if( action == "UP" ) {
1163 pos--;
1164 } else if( action == "DOWN" ) {
1165 pos++;
1166 } else {
1167 // Anything else -> no movement
1168 return false;
1169 }
1170 if( pos < 0 ) {
1171 pos = size - 1;
1172 } else if( pos >= size ) {
1173 pos = 0;
1174 }
1175 return true;
1176}
1177
1178void veh_interact::do_repair()
1179{
1180 task_reason reason = cant_do( 'r' );
1181
1182 if( reason == INVALID_TARGET ) {
1183 vehicle_part *most_repairable = get_most_repariable_part();
1184 if( most_repairable && most_repairable->damage_percent() ) {
1185 move_cursor( ( most_repairable->mount + dd ).rotate( 3 ) );
1186 return;
1187 }
1188 }
1189
1190 auto can_repair = [this, &reason]() {
1191 switch( reason ) {
1192 case LOW_MORALE:
1193 msg = _( "Your morale is too low to repair" );
1194 return false;
1195 case LOW_LIGHT:
1196 msg = _( "It's too dark to see what you are doing" );
1197 return false;
1198 case MOVING_VEHICLE:
1199 msg = _( "You can't repair stuff while driving." );
1200 return false;
1201 case INVALID_TARGET:
1202 msg = _( "There are no damaged parts on this vehicle." );
1203 return false;
1204 default:
1205 break;
1206 }
1207 return true;
1208 };
1209
1210 if( !can_repair() ) {
1211 return;
1212 }
1213
1214 restore_on_out_of_scope<cata::optional<std::string>> prev_title( title );
1215 title = _( "Choose a part here to repair:" );
1216
1217 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
1218
1219 int pos = 0;
1220
1221 restore_on_out_of_scope<int> prev_hilight_part( highlight_part );
1222
1223 player &you = *get_player_character().as_player();
1224 while( true ) {
1225 vehicle_part &pt = veh->part( parts_here[need_repair[pos]] );
1226 const vpart_info &vp = pt.info();
1227
1228 std::string nmsg;
1229
1230 bool ok;
1231 if( pt.is_broken() ) {
1232 ok = format_reqs( nmsg, vp.install_requirements(), vp.install_skills, vp.install_time( you ) );
1233 } else {
1234 if( !vp.repair_requirements().is_empty() && pt.base.max_damage() > 0 ) {
1235 ok = format_reqs( nmsg, vp.repair_requirements() * pt.base.damage_level( 4 ), vp.repair_skills,
1236 vp.repair_time( you ) * pt.base.damage() / pt.base.max_damage() );
1237 } else {
1238 nmsg += colorize( _( "This part cannot be repaired" ), c_light_red );
1239 ok = false;
1240 }
1241 }
1242
1243 const nc_color desc_color = pt.is_broken() ? c_dark_gray : c_light_gray;
1244 vp.format_description( nmsg, desc_color, getmaxx( w_msg ) - 4 );
1245
1246 msg = colorize( nmsg, c_light_gray );
1247
1248 highlight_part = need_repair[pos];
1249
1250 ui_manager::redraw();
1251
1252 const std::string action = main_context.handle_input();
1253 msg.reset();
1254 if( ( action == "REPAIR" || action == "CONFIRM" ) && ok ) {
1255 reason = cant_do( 'r' );
1256 if( !can_repair() ) {
1257 return;
1258 }
1259 sel_vehicle_part = &pt;
1260 sel_vpart_info = &vp;
1261 const std::vector<npc *> helpers = character_funcs::get_crafting_helpers( you, 3 );
1262 for( const npc *np : helpers ) {
1263 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s helps with this task" ), np->name );
1264 }
1265 sel_cmd = 'r';
1266 break;
1267
1268 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
1269 break;
1270
1271 } else {
1272 move_in_list( pos, action, need_repair.size() );
1273 }
1274 }
1275}
1276
1277void veh_interact::do_mend()
1278{
1279 switch( cant_do( 'm' ) ) {
1280 case LOW_MORALE:
1281 msg = _( "Your morale is too low to mend" );
1282 return;
1283 case LOW_LIGHT:
1284 msg = _( "It's too dark to see what you are doing" );
1285 return;
1286 case INVALID_TARGET:
1287 msg = _( "No faulty parts require mending." );
1288 return;
1289 case MOVING_VEHICLE:
1290 msg = _( "You can't mend stuff while driving." );
1291 return;
1292 default:
1293 break;
1294 }
1295
1296 restore_on_out_of_scope<cata::optional<std::string>> prev_title( title );
1297 title = _( "Choose a part here to mend:" );
1298
1299 avatar &you = get_avatar();
1300 const bool toggling = you.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS );
1301 auto sel = [toggling]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1302 if( toggling ) {
1303 return !pt.faults_potential().empty();
1304 } else {
1305 return !pt.faults().empty();
1306 }
1307 };
1308
1309 auto act = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1310 avatar_funcs::mend_item( you, veh->part_base( veh->index_of_part( &pt ) ) );
1311 sel_cmd = 'q';
1312 };
1313
1314 overview( sel, act );
1315}
1316
1317void veh_interact::do_refill()
1318{
1319 switch( cant_do( 'f' ) ) {
1320 case MOVING_VEHICLE:
1321 msg = _( "You can't refill a moving vehicle." );
1322 return;
1323
1324 case INVALID_TARGET:
1325 msg = _( "No parts can currently be refilled." );
1326 return;
1327
1328 default:
1329 break;
1330 }
1331
1332 restore_on_out_of_scope<cata::optional<std::string>> prev_title( title );
1333 title = _( "Select part to refill:" );
1334
1335 auto act = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1336 auto validate = [&]( const item & obj ) {
1337 if( pt.is_tank() ) {
1338 if( obj.is_container() && !obj.contents.empty() ) {
1339 return pt.can_reload( obj.contents.front() );
1340 }
1341 } else if( pt.is_fuel_store() ) {
1342 bool can_reload = pt.can_reload( obj );
1343 if( obj.typeId() == fuel_type_battery && can_reload ) {
1344 msg = _( "You cannot recharge a vehicle battery with handheld batteries" );
1345 return false;
1346 }
1347 return can_reload;
1348 }
1349 return false;
1350 };
1351
1352 target = g->inv_map_splice( validate, string_format( _( "Refill %s" ), pt.name() ), 1 );
1353 if( target ) {
1354 sel_vehicle_part = &pt;
1355 sel_vpart_info = &pt.info();
1356 sel_cmd = 'f';
1357 }
1358 };
1359
1360 overview( can_refill, act );
1361}
1362
1363void veh_interact::calc_overview()
1364{
1365 const auto next_hotkey = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt, char &hotkey ) {
1366 if( overview_action && overview_enable && overview_enable( pt ) ) {
1367 const char ret = hotkey;
1368 // Calculate next hotkey
1369 ++hotkey;
1370 bool finish = false;
1371 while( !finish ) {
1372 switch( hotkey ) {
1373 default:
1374 finish = true;
1375 break;
1376 case '{':
1377 hotkey = 'A';
1378 break;
1379 case 'c':
1380 case 'g':
1381 case 'j':
1382 case 'k':
1383 case 'l':
1384 case 'p':
1385 case 'q':
1386 case 't':
1387 case 'v':
1388 case 'x':
1389 case 'z':
1390 ++hotkey;
1391 break;
1392 }
1393 }
1394 return ret;
1395 } else {
1396 return '\0';
1397 }
1398 };
1399
1400 overview_opts.clear();
1401 overview_headers.clear();
1402
1403 int epower_w = veh->net_battery_charge_rate_w();
1404 overview_headers["ENGINE"] = [this]( const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1405 trim_and_print( w, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w ) - 2, c_light_gray,
1406 string_format( _( "Engines: %sSafe %4d kW</color> %sMax %4d kW</color>" ),
1407 health_color( true ), veh->total_power_w( true, true ) / 1000,
1408 health_color( false ), veh->total_power_w() / 1000 ) );
1409 right_print( w, y, 1, c_light_gray, _( "Fuel Use" ) );
1410 };
1411 overview_headers["TANK"] = []( const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1412 trim_and_print( w, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w ) - 2, c_light_gray, _( "Tanks" ) );
1413 right_print( w, y, 1, c_light_gray, _( "Contents Qty" ) );
1414 };
1415 overview_headers["BATTERY"] = [epower_w]( const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1416 std::string batt;
1417 if( std::abs( epower_w ) < 10000 ) {
1418 batt = string_format( _( "Batteries: %s%+4d W</color>" ),
1419 health_color( epower_w >= 0 ), epower_w );
1420 } else {
1421 batt = string_format( _( "Batteries: %s%+4.1f kW</color>" ),
1422 health_color( epower_w >= 0 ), epower_w / 1000.0 );
1423 }
1424 trim_and_print( w, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w ) - 2, c_light_gray, batt );
1425 right_print( w, y, 1, c_light_gray, _( "Capacity Status" ) );
1426 };
1427 overview_headers["REACTOR"] = [this, epower_w]( const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1428 int reactor_epower_w = veh->max_reactor_epower_w();
1429 if( reactor_epower_w > 0 && epower_w < 0 ) {
1430 reactor_epower_w += epower_w;
1431 }
1432 std::string reactor;
1433 if( reactor_epower_w == 0 ) {
1434 reactor = _( "Reactors" );
1435 } else if( reactor_epower_w < 10000 ) {
1436 reactor = string_format( _( "Reactors: Up to %s%+4d W</color>" ),
1437 health_color( reactor_epower_w ), reactor_epower_w );
1438 } else {
1439 reactor = string_format( _( "Reactors: Up to %s%+4.1f kW</color>" ),
1440 health_color( reactor_epower_w ), reactor_epower_w / 1000.0 );
1441 }
1442 trim_and_print( w, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w ) - 2, c_light_gray, reactor );
1443 right_print( w, y, 1, c_light_gray, _( "Contents Qty" ) );
1444 };
1445 overview_headers["TURRET"] = []( const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1446 trim_and_print( w, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w ) - 2, c_light_gray, _( "Turrets" ) );
1447 right_print( w, y, 1, c_light_gray, _( "Ammo Qty" ) );
1448 };
1449 overview_headers["SEAT"] = []( const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1450 trim_and_print( w, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w ) - 2, c_light_gray, _( "Seats" ) );
1451 right_print( w, y, 1, c_light_gray, _( "Who" ) );
1452 };
1453
1454 char hotkey = 'a';
1455
1456 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
1457 if( vpr.part().is_engine() && vpr.part().is_available() ) {
1458 // if tank contains something then display the contents in milliliters
1459 auto details = []( const vehicle_part & pt, const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1460 right_print(
1461 w, y, 1, pt.ammo_current()->color,
1462 string_format(
1463 "%s <color_light_gray>%s</color>",
1464 !pt.fuel_current().is_null() ? item::nname( pt.fuel_current() ) : "",
1465 //~ translation should not exceed 3 console cells
1466 right_justify( pt.enabled ? _( "Yes" ) : _( "No" ), 3 ) ) );
1467 };
1468
1469 // display engine faults (if any)
1470 auto msg_cb = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1471 msg = std::string();
1472 for( const auto &e : pt.faults() ) {
1473 msg = msg.value() + string_format( "%s\n %s\n\n", colorize( e->name(), c_red ),
1474 colorize( e->description(), c_light_gray ) );
1475 }
1476 };
1477 overview_opts.emplace_back( "ENGINE", &vpr.part(), next_hotkey( vpr.part(), hotkey ), details,
1478 msg_cb );
1479 }
1480 }
1481
1482 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
1483 if( vpr.part().is_tank() && vpr.part().is_available() ) {
1484 auto details = []( const vehicle_part & pt, const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1485 if( !pt.ammo_current().is_null() ) {
1486 std::string specials;
1487 const item &it = pt.base.contents.front();
1488 // a space isn't actually needed in front of the tags here,
1489 // but item::display_name tags use a space so this prevents
1490 // needing *second* translation for the same thing with a
1491 // space in front of it
1492 if( it.rotten() ) {
1493 specials += _( " (rotten)" );
1494 }
1495 units::volume vol = pt.base.contents.front().volume();
1496 const itype *pt_ammo_cur = &*pt.ammo_current();
1497 int offset = 1;
1498 std::string fmtstring = "%s %s %5.1fL";
1499 if( pt.is_leaking() ) {
1500 fmtstring = "%s %s " + leak_marker + "%5.1fL" + leak_marker;
1501 offset = 0;
1502 }
1503 right_print( w, y, offset, pt_ammo_cur->color,
1504 string_format( fmtstring, specials, pt_ammo_cur->nname( 1 ),
1505 round_up( to_liter( vol ), 1 ) ) );
1506 } else {
1507 if( pt.is_leaking() ) {
1508 std::string outputstr = leak_marker + " " + leak_marker;
1509 right_print( w, y, 0, c_light_gray, outputstr );
1510 }
1511 }
1512 };
1513 overview_opts.emplace_back( "TANK", &vpr.part(), next_hotkey( vpr.part(), hotkey ), details );
1514 } else if( vpr.part().is_fuel_store() && !( vpr.part().is_battery() || vpr.part().is_reactor() ) &&
1515 !vpr.part().is_broken() ) {
1516 auto details = []( const vehicle_part & pt, const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1517 if( !pt.ammo_current().is_null() ) {
1518 const itype *pt_ammo_cur = &*pt.ammo_current();
1519 auto stack = units::legacy_volume_factor / pt_ammo_cur->stack_size;
1520 int offset = 1;
1521 std::string fmtstring = "%s %5.1fL";
1522 if( pt.is_leaking() ) {
1523 fmtstring = "%s " + leak_marker + "%5.1fL" + leak_marker;
1524 offset = 0;
1525 }
1526 right_print( w, y, offset, pt_ammo_cur->color,
1527 string_format( fmtstring, item::nname( pt.ammo_current() ),
1528 round_up( to_liter( pt.ammo_remaining() * stack ), 1 ) ) );
1529 }
1530 };
1531 overview_opts.emplace_back( "TANK", &vpr.part(), next_hotkey( vpr.part(), hotkey ), details );
1532 }
1533 }
1534
1535 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
1536 if( vpr.part().is_battery() && vpr.part().is_available() ) {
1537 // always display total battery capacity and percentage charge
1538 auto details = []( const vehicle_part & pt, const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1539 int pct = ( static_cast<double>( pt.ammo_remaining() ) / pt.ammo_capacity() ) * 100;
1540 int offset = 1;
1541 std::string fmtstring = "%i %3i%%";
1542 if( pt.is_leaking() ) {
1543 fmtstring = "%i " + leak_marker + "%3i%%" + leak_marker;
1544 offset = 0;
1545 }
1546 right_print( w, y, offset, pt.ammo_current()->color,
1547 string_format( fmtstring, pt.ammo_capacity(), pct ) );
1548 };
1549 overview_opts.emplace_back( "BATTERY", &vpr.part(), next_hotkey( vpr.part(), hotkey ), details );
1550 }
1551 }
1552
1553 auto details_ammo = []( const vehicle_part & pt, const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1554 if( pt.ammo_remaining() ) {
1555 int offset = 1;
1556 std::string fmtstring = "%s %5i";
1557 if( pt.is_leaking() ) {
1558 fmtstring = "%s " + leak_marker + "%5i" + leak_marker;
1559 offset = 0;
1560 }
1561 right_print( w, y, offset, pt.ammo_current()->color,
1562 string_format( fmtstring, item::nname( pt.ammo_current() ), pt.ammo_remaining() ) );
1563 }
1564 };
1565
1566 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
1567 if( vpr.part().is_reactor() && vpr.part().is_available() ) {
1568 overview_opts.emplace_back( "REACTOR", &vpr.part(), next_hotkey( vpr.part(), hotkey ),
1569 details_ammo );
1570 }
1571 }
1572
1573 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
1574 if( vpr.part().is_turret() && vpr.part().is_available() ) {
1575 overview_opts.emplace_back( "TURRET", &vpr.part(), next_hotkey( vpr.part(), hotkey ),
1576 details_ammo );
1577 }
1578 }
1579
1580 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
1581 auto details = []( const vehicle_part & pt, const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1582 const npc *who = pt.crew();
1583 if( who ) {
1584 right_print( w, y, 1, pt.passenger_id == who->getID() ? c_green : c_light_gray, who->name );
1585 }
1586 };
1587 if( vpr.part().is_seat() && vpr.part().is_available() ) {
1588 overview_opts.emplace_back( "SEAT", &vpr.part(), next_hotkey( vpr.part(), hotkey ), details );
1589 }
1590 }
1591}
1592
1593void veh_interact::display_overview()
1594{
1595 werase( w_list );
1596 std::string last;
1597 int y = 0;
1598 if( overview_offset ) {
1599 trim_and_print( w_list, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w_list ) - 1,
1600 c_yellow, _( "'{' to scroll up" ) );
1601 y++;
1602 }
1603 for( int idx = overview_offset; idx != static_cast<int>( overview_opts.size() ); ++idx ) {
1604 const auto &pt = *overview_opts[idx].part;
1605
1606 // if this is a new section print a header row
1607 if( last != overview_opts[idx].key ) {
1608 y += last.empty() ? 0 : 1;
1609 overview_headers[overview_opts[idx].key]( w_list, y );
1610 y += 2;
1611 last = overview_opts[idx].key;
1612 }
1613
1614 bool highlighted = false;
1615 // No action means no selecting, just highlight relevant ones
1616 if( overview_pos < 0 && overview_enable && !overview_action ) {
1617 highlighted = overview_enable( pt );
1618 } else if( overview_pos == idx ) {
1619 highlighted = true;
1620 }
1621
1622 // print part name
1623 nc_color col = overview_opts[idx].hotkey ? c_white : c_dark_gray;
1624 trim_and_print( w_list, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w_list ) - 1,
1625 highlighted ? hilite( col ) : col,
1626 "<color_dark_gray>%c </color>%s",
1627 overview_opts[idx].hotkey ? overview_opts[idx].hotkey : ' ', pt.name() );
1628
1629 // print extra columns (if any)
1630 overview_opts[idx].details( pt, w_list, y );
1631 y++;
1632 if( y < ( getmaxy( w_list ) - 1 ) ) {
1633 overview_limit = overview_offset;
1634 } else {
1635 overview_limit = idx;
1636 trim_and_print( w_list, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w_list ) - 1,
1637 c_yellow, _( "'}' to scroll down" ) );
1638 break;
1639 }
1640 }
1641
1642 wnoutrefresh( w_list );
1643}
1644
1645void veh_interact::overview( const overview_enable_t &enable,
1646 const overview_action_t &action )
1647{
1648 restore_on_out_of_scope<overview_enable_t> prev_overview_enable( overview_enable );
1649 restore_on_out_of_scope<overview_action_t> prev_overview_action( overview_action );
1650 overview_enable = enable;
1651 overview_action = action;
1652
1653 restore_on_out_of_scope<int> prev_overview_pos( overview_pos );
1654
1655 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
1656
1657 while( true ) {
1658 calc_overview();
1659
1660 if( overview_pos < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( overview_pos ) >= overview_opts.size() ) {
1661 overview_pos = -1;
1662 do {
1663 if( ++overview_pos >= static_cast<int>( overview_opts.size() ) ) {
1664 overview_pos = -1;
1665 break; // nothing could be selected
1666 }
1667 } while( !overview_opts[overview_pos].hotkey );
1668 }
1669
1670 const bool has_any_hotkey = std::any_of( overview_opts.begin(), overview_opts.end(),
1671 []( const part_option & e ) {
1672 return e.hotkey;
1673 } );
1674 if( !has_any_hotkey ) {
1675 return; // nothing is selectable
1676 }
1677
1678 if( overview_pos >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( overview_pos ) < overview_opts.size() ) {
1679 move_cursor( ( overview_opts[overview_pos].part->mount + dd ).rotate( 3 ) );
1680 }
1681
1682 if( overview_pos >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( overview_pos ) < overview_opts.size() &&
1683 overview_opts[overview_pos].message ) {
1684 overview_opts[overview_pos].message( *overview_opts[overview_pos].part );
1685 } else {
1686 msg.reset();
1687 }
1688
1689 ui_manager::redraw();
1690
1691 const std::string input = main_context.handle_input();
1692 msg.reset();
1693 if( input == "CONFIRM" && overview_opts[overview_pos].hotkey && overview_action ) {
1694 overview_action( *overview_opts[overview_pos].part );
1695 break;
1696
1697 } else if( input == "QUIT" ) {
1698 break;
1699
1700 } else if( input == "UP" ) {
1701 do {
1702 move_overview_line( -1 );
1703 if( --overview_pos < 0 ) {
1704 overview_pos = overview_opts.size() - 1;
1705 }
1706 } while( !overview_opts[overview_pos].hotkey );
1707 } else if( input == "DOWN" ) {
1708 do {
1709 move_overview_line( 1 );
1710 if( ++overview_pos >= static_cast<int>( overview_opts.size() ) ) {
1711 overview_pos = 0;
1712 }
1713 } while( !overview_opts[overview_pos].hotkey );
1714 } else {
1715 // did we try and activate a hotkey option?
1716 char hotkey = main_context.get_raw_input().get_first_input();
1717 if( hotkey && overview_action ) {
1718 auto iter = std::find_if( overview_opts.begin(),
1719 overview_opts.end(), [&hotkey]( const part_option & e ) {
1720 return e.hotkey == hotkey;
1721 } );
1722 if( iter != overview_opts.end() ) {
1723 overview_action( *iter->part );
1724 break;
1725 }
1726 }
1727 }
1728 }
1729}
1730
1731void veh_interact::move_overview_line( int amount )
1732{
1733 overview_offset += amount;
1734 overview_offset = std::max( 0, overview_offset );
1735 overview_offset = std::min( overview_limit, overview_offset );
1736}
1737
1738vehicle_part *veh_interact::get_most_damaged_part() const
1739{
1740 auto part_damage_comparison = []( const vpart_reference & a, const vpart_reference & b ) {
1741 return !b.part().removed && b.part().base.damage() > a.part().base.damage();
1742 };
1743 const vehicle_part_range vpr = veh->get_all_parts();
1744 auto high_damage_iterator = std::max_element( vpr.begin(),
1745 vpr.end(),
1746 part_damage_comparison );
1747 if( high_damage_iterator == vpr.end() ||
1748 high_damage_iterator->part().removed ) {
1749 return nullptr;
1750 }
1751
1752 return &( *high_damage_iterator ).part();
1753}
1754
1755vehicle_part *veh_interact::get_most_repariable_part() const
1756{
1757 auto &part = veh_utils::most_repairable_part( *veh, g->u );
1758 return part ? &part : nullptr;
1759}
1760
1761bool veh_interact::can_remove_part( int idx, const player &p )
1762{
1763 sel_vehicle_part = &veh->part( idx );
1764 sel_vpart_info = &sel_vehicle_part->info();
1765 std::string nmsg;
1766
1767 if( sel_vehicle_part->is_broken() ) {
1768 nmsg += string_format(
1769 _( "<color_white>Removing the broken %1$s may yield some fragments.</color>\n" ),
1770 sel_vehicle_part->name() );
1771 } else {
1772 item result_of_removal = sel_vehicle_part->properties_to_item();
1773 nmsg += string_format(
1774 _( "<color_white>Removing the %1$s will yield:</color>\n> %2$s\n" ),
1775 sel_vehicle_part->name(), result_of_removal.display_name() );
1776 }
1777
1778 const auto reqs = sel_vpart_info->removal_requirements();
1779 bool ok = format_reqs( nmsg, reqs, sel_vpart_info->removal_skills,
1780 sel_vpart_info->removal_time( p ) );
1781 std::string additional_requirements;
1782 bool lifting_or_jacking_required = false;
1783
1784 int lvl = 0;
1785 int str = 0;
1786 quality_id qual;
1787 bool use_aid = false;
1788 bool use_str = false;
1789 item base( sel_vpart_info->item );
1790 if( sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "NEEDS_JACKING" ) ) {
1791 lifting_or_jacking_required = true;
1792 qual = qual_JACK;
1793 lvl = jack_quality( *veh );
1794 str = veh->lift_strength();
1795 use_aid = ( max_jack >= lvl ) || can_self_jack();
1796 use_str = character_funcs::can_lift_with_helpers( p, str );
1797 } else if( get_option<bool>( "DISABLE_LIFTING" ) || sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "NO_LIFT_REQ" ) ) {
1798 use_aid = true;
1799 use_str = true;
1800 } else {
1801 lifting_or_jacking_required = true;
1802 qual = qual_LIFT;
1803 lvl = std::ceil( units::quantity<double, units::mass::unit_type>( base.weight() ) /
1804 TOOL_LIFT_FACTOR );
1805 str = base.lift_strength();
1806 use_aid = max_lift >= lvl;
1807 use_str = character_funcs::can_lift_with_helpers( p, base.lift_strength() );
1808 }
1809
1810 if( !( use_aid || use_str ) ) {
1811 ok = false;
1812 }
1813 if( lifting_or_jacking_required ) {
1814 nc_color aid_color = use_aid ? c_green : ( use_str ? c_dark_gray : c_red );
1815 nc_color str_color = use_str ? c_green : ( use_aid ? c_dark_gray : c_red );
1816 const auto helpers = character_funcs::get_crafting_helpers( p );
1817 //~ %1$s is quality name, %2$d is quality level
1818 std::string aid_string = string_format( _( "1 tool with %1$s %2$d" ),
1819 qual.obj().name, lvl );
1820
1821 std::string str_string;
1822 if( !helpers.empty() ) {
1823 str_string = string_format( _( "strength ( assisted ) %d" ), str );
1824 } else {
1825 str_string = string_format( _( "strength %d" ), str );
1826 }
1827
1828 additional_requirements += string_format( _( "> %1$s <color_white>OR</color> %2$s" ),
1829 colorize( aid_string, aid_color ), colorize( str_string, str_color ) ) + "\n";
1830 }
1831 std::string reason;
1832 if( !veh->can_unmount( idx, reason ) ) {
1833 //~ %1$s represents the internal color name which shouldn't be translated, %2$s is pre-translated reason
1834 additional_requirements += string_format( _( "> %1$s%2$s</color>" ), status_color( false ),
1835 reason ) + "\n";
1836 ok = false;
1837
1838 }
1839 if( !additional_requirements.empty() ) {
1840 nmsg += _( "<color_white>Additional requirements:</color>\n" );
1841 nmsg += additional_requirements;
1842 }
1843 const nc_color desc_color = sel_vehicle_part->is_broken() ? c_dark_gray : c_light_gray;
1844 sel_vehicle_part->info().format_description( nmsg, desc_color, getmaxx( w_msg ) - 4 );
1845
1846 msg = colorize( nmsg, c_light_gray );
1847 return ok || g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS );
1848}
1849
1850void veh_interact::do_remove()
1851{
1852 task_reason reason = cant_do( 'o' );
1853
1854 if( reason == INVALID_TARGET ) {
1855 msg = _( "No parts here." );
1856 return;
1857 }
1858
1859 restore_on_out_of_scope<cata::optional<std::string>> prev_title( title );
1860 title = _( "Choose a part here to remove:" );
1861
1862 player &you = *get_player_character().as_player();
1863 int pos = 0;
1864 for( size_t i = 0; i < parts_here.size(); i++ ) {
1865 if( can_remove_part( parts_here[ i ], you ) ) {
1866 pos = i;
1867 break;
1868 }
1869 }
1870 msg.reset();
1871
1872 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
1873
1874 restore_on_out_of_scope<overview_enable_t> prev_overview_enable( overview_enable );
1875
1876 restore_on_out_of_scope<int> prev_hilight_part( highlight_part );
1877
1878 while( true ) {
1879 int part = parts_here[ pos ];
1880
1881 bool can_remove = can_remove_part( part, you );
1882
1883 overview_enable = [this, part]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1884 return &pt == &veh->part( part );
1885 };
1886
1887 highlight_part = pos;
1888
1889 calc_overview();
1890 ui_manager::redraw();
1891
1892 //read input
1893 const std::string action = main_context.handle_input();
1894 msg.reset();
1895 if( can_remove && ( action == "REMOVE" || action == "CONFIRM" ) ) {
1896 switch( reason ) {
1897 case LOW_MORALE:
1898 msg = _( "Your morale is too low to construct" );
1899 return;
1900 case LOW_LIGHT:
1901 msg = _( "It's too dark to see what you are doing" );
1902 return;
1903 case NOT_FREE:
1904 msg = _( "You cannot remove that part while something is attached to it." );
1905 return;
1906 case MOVING_VEHICLE:
1907 msg = _( "Better not remove something while driving." );
1908 return;
1909 default:
1910 break;
1911 }
1912 const std::vector<npc *> helpers = character_funcs::get_crafting_helpers( you, 3 );
1913 for( const npc *np : helpers ) {
1914 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s helps with this task" ), np->name );
1915 }
1916 sel_cmd = 'o';
1917 break;
1918 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
1919 break;
1920 } else {
1921 move_in_list( pos, action, parts_here.size() );
1922 }
1923 }
1924}
1925
1926void veh_interact::do_siphon()
1927{
1928 switch( cant_do( 's' ) ) {
1929 case INVALID_TARGET:
1930 msg = _( "The vehicle has no liquid fuel left to siphon." );
1931 return;
1932
1933 case LACK_TOOLS:
1934 msg = _( "You need a <color_red>hose</color> to siphon liquid fuel." );
1935 return;
1936
1937 case MOVING_VEHICLE:
1938 msg = _( "You can't siphon from a moving vehicle." );
1939 return;
1940
1941 default:
1942 break;
1943 }
1944
1945 restore_on_out_of_scope<cata::optional<std::string>> prev_title( title );
1946 title = _( "Select part to siphon:" );
1947
1948 auto sel = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1949 return( pt.is_tank() && pt.base.contents_made_of( LIQUID ) );
1950 };
1951
1952 auto act = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1953 on_out_of_scope restore_ui( [&]() {
1954 hide_ui( false );
1955 } );
1956 hide_ui( true );
1957 const item &base = pt.get_base();
1958 const int idx = veh->find_part( base );
1959 item liquid( base.contents.back() );
1960 const int liq_charges = liquid.charges;
1961 if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid( liquid, nullptr, 1, nullptr, veh, idx ) ) {
1962 veh->drain( idx, liq_charges - liquid.charges );
1963 }
1964 };
1965
1966 overview( sel, act );
1967}

1969bool veh_interact::do_unload()
1970{
1971 switch( cant_do( 'd' ) ) {
1972 case INVALID_TARGET:
1973 msg = _( "The vehicle has no solid fuel left to remove." );
1974 return false;
1975
1976 case MOVING_VEHICLE:
1977 msg = _( "You can't unload from a moving vehicle." );
1978 return false;
1979
1980 default:
1981 break;
1982 }
1983
1984 act_vehicle_unload_fuel( veh );
1985 return true;
1986}

1988void veh_interact::do_change_shape()
1989{
1990 if( cant_do( 'p' ) == task_reason::INVALID_TARGET ) {
1991 msg = _( "No parts here or the part visible from your position does not have different shapes" );
1992 return;
1993 }
1994
1995 vehicle_part &part = veh->part( veh->part_displayed_at( veh->part( cpart ).mount ) );
1996 const vpart_info &part_info = part.info();
1997
1998 using v_shapes = std::vector<const vpart_info *, std::allocator<const vpart_info *>>;
1999 const v_shapes &shapes = vpart_shapes[part_info.name() + part_info.item.str()];
2000
2001 uilist smenu;
2002 smenu.text = _( "Choose shape:" );
2003 smenu.w_width_setup = [this]() {
2004 return getmaxx( w_list );
2005 };
2006 smenu.w_x_setup = [this]( const int ) {
2007 return getbegx( w_list );
2008 };
2009 smenu.w_y_setup = [this]( const int ) {
2010 return getbegy( w_list );
2011 };
2012
2013 int ret_code = 0;
2014 for( const vpart_info *const shape : shapes ) {
2015 uilist_entry entry( shape->name() );
2016 entry.retval = ret_code++;
2017 entry.extratxt.left = 1;
2018 entry.extratxt.sym = special_symbol( shape->sym );
2019 entry.extratxt.color = shape->color;
2020 smenu.entries.emplace_back( entry );
2021 }
2022
2023 sort_uilist_entries_by_line_drawing( smenu.entries );
2024
2025 smenu.query();
2026 if( smenu.ret >= 0 ) {
2027 const vpart_info *selected_shape = shapes[smenu.ret];
2028 part.proxy_part_id = selected_shape->get_id();
2029 part.proxy_sym = selected_shape->sym;
2030 }
2031}

2033void veh_interact::do_assign_crew()
2034{
2035 if( cant_do( 'w' ) != CAN_DO ) {
2036 msg = _( "Need at least one seat and an ally to assign crew members." );
2037 return;
2038 }
2039
2040 restore_on_out_of_scope<cata::optional<std::string>> prev_title( title );
2041 title = _( "Assign crew positions:" );
2042
2043 auto sel = []( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
2044 return pt.is_seat();
2045 };
2046
2047 auto act = [&]( vehicle_part & pt ) {
2048 uilist menu;
2049 menu.text = _( "Select crew member" );
2050
2051 if( pt.crew() ) {
2052 menu.addentry( 0, true, 'c', _( "Clear assignment" ) );
2053 }
2054
2055 for( const npc *e : g->allies() ) {
2056 menu.addentry( e->getID().get_value(), true, -1, e->name );
2057 }
2058
2059 menu.query();
2060 if( menu.ret == 0 ) {
2061 pt.unset_crew();
2062 } else if( menu.ret > 0 ) {
2063 const auto &who = *g->critter_by_id<npc>( character_id( menu.ret ) );
2064 veh->assign_seat( pt, who );
2065 }
2066 };
2067
2068 overview( sel, act );
2069}

2104/**
2105 * Returns the first part on the vehicle at the given position.
2106 * @param d The coordinates, relative to the viewport's 0-point (?)
2107 * @return The first vehicle part at the specified coordinates.
2108 */
2109int veh_interact::part_at( point d )
2110{
2111 const point vd = -dd + d.rotate( 1 );
2112 return veh->part_displayed_at( vd );
2113}
2114
2115/**
2116 * Checks to see if you can potentially install this part at current position.
2117 * Affects coloring in display_list() and is also used to
2118 * sort can_mount so potentially installable parts come first.
2119 */
2120bool veh_interact::can_potentially_install( const vpart_info &vpart )
2121{
2122 return g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) ||
2123 vpart.install_requirements().can_make_with_inventory( crafting_inv, is_crafting_component );
2124}
2125
2126/**
2127 * Moves the cursor on the vehicle editing window.
2128 * @param d How far to move the cursor.
2129 * @param dstart_at How far to change the start position for vehicle part descriptions
2130 */
2131void veh_interact::move_cursor( point d, int dstart_at )
2132{
2133 dd += d.rotate( 3 );
2134 if( d != point_zero ) {
2135 start_limit = 0;
2136 } else {
2137 start_at += dstart_at;
2138 }
2139
2140 // Update the current active component index to the new position.
2141 cpart = part_at( point_zero );
2142 const point vd = -dd;
2143 const point q = veh->coord_translate( vd );
2144 const tripoint vehp = veh->global_pos3() + q;
2145 const bool has_critter = g->critter_at( vehp );
2146 bool obstruct = g->m.impassable_ter_furn( vehp );
2147 const optional_vpart_position ovp = g->m.veh_at( vehp );
2148 if( ovp && &ovp->vehicle() != veh ) {
2149 obstruct = true;
2150 }
2151
2152 can_mount.clear();
2153 if( !obstruct ) {
2154 int divider_index = 0;
2155 for( const auto &e : vpart_info::all() ) {
2156 const vpart_info &vp = e.second;
2157 if( has_critter && vp.has_flag( VPFLAG_OBSTACLE ) ) {
2158 continue;
2159 }
2160 if( veh->can_mount( vd, vp.get_id() ) ) {
2161 if( vp.get_id() != vpart_shapes[ vp.name() + vp.item.str() ][ 0 ]->get_id() ) {
2162 // only add first shape to install list
2163 continue;
2164 }
2165 if( can_potentially_install( vp ) ) {
2166 can_mount.insert( can_mount.begin() + divider_index++, &vp );
2167 } else {
2168 can_mount.push_back( &vp );
2169 }
2170 }
2171 }
2172 }
2173
2174 need_repair.clear();
2175 parts_here.clear();
2176 wheel = nullptr;
2177 if( cpart >= 0 ) {
2178 parts_here = veh->parts_at_relative( veh->part( cpart ).mount, true );
2179 for( size_t i = 0; i < parts_here.size(); i++ ) {
2180 auto &pt = veh->part( parts_here[i] );
2181
2182 if( pt.base.damage() > 0 && pt.info().is_repairable() ) {
2183 need_repair.push_back( i );
2184 }
2185 if( pt.info().has_flag( "WHEEL" ) ) {
2186 wheel = &pt;
2187 }
2188 }
2189 }
2190
2191 /* Update the lifting quality to be the that is available for this newly selected tile */
2192 cache_tool_availability_update_lifting( vehp );
2193}

2195void veh_interact::display_grid()
2196{
2197 // border window
2198 draw_border( w_border );
2199
2200 // match grid lines
2201 const int y_mode = getmaxy( w_mode ) + 1;
2202 // |-
2203 mvwputch( w_border, point( 0, y_mode ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XXXO );
2204 // -|
2205 mvwputch( w_border, point( TERMX - 1, y_mode ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XOXX );
2206 const int y_list = getbegy( w_list ) + getmaxy( w_list );
2207 // |-
2208 mvwputch( w_border, point( 0, y_list ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XXXO );
2209 // -|
2210 mvwputch( w_border, point( TERMX - 1, y_list ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XOXX );
2211
2212 const int grid_w = getmaxx( w_border ) - 2;
2213
2214 // Two lines dividing the three middle sections.
2215 for( int i = 1 + getmaxy( w_mode ); i < ( 1 + getmaxy( w_mode ) + page_size ); ++i ) {
2216 // |
2217 mvwputch( w_border, point( getmaxx( w_disp ) + 1, i + 1 ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XOXO );
2218 // |
2219 mvwputch( w_border, point( getmaxx( w_disp ) + 2 + getmaxx( w_list ), i + 1 ), BORDER_COLOR,
2220 LINE_XOXO );
2221 }
2222 // Two lines dividing the vertical menu sections.
2223 for( int i = 0; i < grid_w; ++i ) {
2224 // -
2225 mvwputch( w_border, point( i + 1, getmaxy( w_mode ) + 1 ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_OXOX );
2226 // -
2227 mvwputch( w_border, point( i + 1, getmaxy( w_mode ) + 2 + page_size ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_OXOX );
2228 }
2229 // Fix up the line intersections.
2230 mvwputch( w_border, point( getmaxx( w_disp ) + 1, getmaxy( w_mode ) + 1 ), BORDER_COLOR,
2231 LINE_OXXX );
2232 // _|_
2233 mvwputch( w_border, point( getmaxx( w_disp ) + 1, getmaxy( w_mode ) + 2 + page_size ), BORDER_COLOR,
2234 LINE_XXOX );
2235 mvwputch( w_border, point( getmaxx( w_disp ) + 2 + getmaxx( w_list ), getmaxy( w_mode ) + 1 ),
2236 BORDER_COLOR, LINE_OXXX );
2237 // _|_
2238 mvwputch( w_border, point( getmaxx( w_disp ) + 2 + getmaxx( w_list ),
2239 getmaxy( w_mode ) + 2 + page_size ),
2240 BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XXOX );
2241
2242 wnoutrefresh( w_border );
2243}
