2245/**
2246 * Draws the viewport with the vehicle.
2247 */
2248void veh_interact::display_veh()
2249{
2250 werase( w_disp );
2251 const point h_size = point( getmaxx( w_disp ), getmaxy( w_disp ) ) / 2;
2252
2253 if( debug_mode ) {
2254 // show CoM, pivot in debug mode
2255
2256 point pivot = veh->pivot_point();
2257 point com = veh->local_center_of_mass();
2258 const point cur = -dd;
2259
2260 mvwprintz( w_disp, point_zero, c_green, "CoM %d,%d", com.x, com.y );
2261 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-use-named-point-constants)
2262 mvwprintz( w_disp, point( 0, 1 ), c_red, "Pivot %d,%d", pivot.x, pivot.y );
2263 mvwprintz( w_disp, point( 0, 2 ), c_dark_gray, "Cur %d,%d", cur.x, cur.y );
2264
2265 const point com_s = ( com + dd ).rotate( 3 ) + h_size;
2266 const point pivot_s = ( pivot + dd ).rotate( 3 ) + h_size;
2267
2268 for( int x = 0; x < getmaxx( w_disp ); ++x ) {
2269 if( x <= com_s.x ) {
2270 mvwputch( w_disp, point( x, com_s.y ), c_green, LINE_OXOX );
2271 }
2272
2273 if( x >= pivot_s.x ) {
2274 mvwputch( w_disp, point( x, pivot_s.y ), c_red, LINE_OXOX );
2275 }
2276 }
2277
2278 for( int y = 0; y < getmaxy( w_disp ); ++y ) {
2279 if( y <= com_s.y ) {
2280 mvwputch( w_disp, point( com_s.x, y ), c_green, LINE_XOXO );
2281 }
2282
2283 if( y >= pivot_s.y ) {
2284 mvwputch( w_disp, point( pivot_s.x, y ), c_red, LINE_XOXO );
2285 }
2286 }
2287 }
2288
2289 // Draw guidelines to make current selection point more visible.
2290 for( int y = 0; y < getmaxy( w_disp ); ++y ) {
2291 mvwputch( w_disp, point( h_size.x, y ), c_dark_gray, LINE_XOXO );
2292 }
2293
2294 for( int x = 0; x < getmaxx( w_disp ); ++x ) {
2295 mvwputch( w_disp, point( x, h_size.y ), c_dark_gray, LINE_OXOX );
2296 }
2297
2298 //Iterate over structural parts so we only hit each square once
2299 std::vector<int> structural_parts = veh->all_parts_at_location( "structure" );
2300 for( auto &structural_part : structural_parts ) {
2301 const int p = structural_part;
2302 int sym = veh->part_sym( p );
2303 nc_color col = veh->part_color( p );
2304
2305 const point q = ( veh->part( p ).mount + dd ).rotate( 3 );
2306
2307 if( q == point_zero ) {
2308 col = hilite( col );
2309 cpart = p;
2310 }
2311 mvwputch( w_disp, h_size + q, col, special_symbol( sym ) );
2312 }
2313
2314 const int hw = getmaxx( w_disp ) / 2;
2315 const int hh = getmaxy( w_disp ) / 2;
2316 const point vd = -dd;
2317 const point q = veh->coord_translate( vd );
2318 const tripoint vehp = veh->global_pos3() + q;
2319 bool obstruct = g->m.impassable_ter_furn( vehp );
2320 const optional_vpart_position ovp = g->m.veh_at( vehp );
2321 if( ovp && &ovp->vehicle() != veh ) {
2322 obstruct = true;
2323 }
2324 nc_color col = cpart >= 0 ? veh->part_color( cpart ) : c_black;
2325 int sym = cpart >= 0 ? veh->part_sym( cpart ) : ' ';
2326 mvwputch( w_disp, point( hw, hh ), obstruct ? red_background( col ) : hilite( col ),
2327 special_symbol( sym ) );
2328 wnoutrefresh( w_disp );
2329}
2330
2331static std::string wheel_state_description( const vehicle &veh )
2332{
2333 bool is_boat = !veh.floating.empty();
2334 bool is_land = !veh.wheelcache.empty() || !is_boat;
2335
2336 bool suf_land = veh.sufficient_wheel_config();
2337 bool bal_land = veh.balanced_wheel_config();
2338
2339 bool suf_boat = veh.can_float();
2340
2341 float steer = veh.steering_effectiveness();
2342
2343 std::string wheel_status;
2344 if( !suf_land && is_boat ) {
2345 wheel_status = _( "<color_light_red>disabled</color>" );
2346 } else if( !suf_land ) {
2347 wheel_status = _( "<color_light_red>lack</color>" );
2348 } else if( !bal_land ) {
2349 wheel_status = _( "<color_light_red>unbalanced</color>" );
2350 } else if( steer < 0 ) {
2351 wheel_status = _( "<color_light_red>no steering</color>" );
2352 } else if( steer < 0.033 ) {
2353 wheel_status = _( "<color_light_red>broken steering</color>" );
2354 } else if( steer < 0.5 ) {
2355 wheel_status = _( "<color_light_red>poor steering</color>" );
2356 } else {
2357 wheel_status = _( "<color_light_green>enough</color>" );
2358 }
2359
2360 std::string boat_status;
2361 if( !suf_boat ) {
2362 boat_status = _( "<color_light_red>sinks</color>" );
2363 } else {
2364 boat_status = _( "<color_light_blue>floats</color>" );
2365 }
2366
2367 if( is_boat && is_land ) {
2368 return string_format( _( "Wheels/boat: %s/%s" ), wheel_status, boat_status );
2369 }
2370
2371 if( is_boat ) {
2372 return string_format( _( "Boat: %s" ), boat_status );
2373 }
2374
2375 return string_format( _( "Wheels: %s" ), wheel_status );
2376}
2377
2378/**
2379 * Displays the vehicle's stats at the bottom of the window.
2380 */
2381void veh_interact::display_stats() const
2382{
2383 werase( w_stats );
2384
2385 // see exec()
2386 const int extraw = ( ( TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 4 ) * 2;
2387 // 3 * stats_h
2388 const int slots = 24;
2389 int x[slots], y[slots], w[slots];
2390
2391 units::volume total_cargo = 0_ml;
2392 units::volume free_cargo = 0_ml;
2393 for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh->get_any_parts( "CARGO" ) ) {
2394 const size_t p = vp.part_index();
2395 total_cargo += veh->max_volume( p );
2396 free_cargo += veh->free_volume( p );
2397 }
2398
2399 const int second_column = 33 + ( extraw / 4 );
2400 const int third_column = 65 + ( extraw / 2 );
2401 for( int i = 0; i < slots; i++ ) {
2402 if( i < stats_h ) {
2403 // First column
2404 x[i] = 1;
2405 y[i] = i;
2406 w[i] = second_column - 2;
2407 } else if( i < ( 2 * stats_h ) ) {
2408 // Second column
2409 x[i] = second_column;
2410 y[i] = i - stats_h;
2411 w[i] = third_column - second_column - 1;
2412 } else {
2413 // Third column
2414 x[i] = third_column;
2415 y[i] = i - 2 * stats_h;
2416 w[i] = extraw - third_column - 2;
2417 }
2418 }
2419
2420 bool is_boat = !veh->floating.empty();
2421 bool is_ground = !veh->wheelcache.empty() || !is_boat;
2422 bool is_aircraft = veh->is_rotorcraft() && veh->is_flying_in_air();
2423
2424 const auto vel_to_int = []( const double vel ) {
2425 return static_cast<int>( convert_velocity( vel, VU_VEHICLE ) );
2426 };
2427
2428 int i = 0;
2429
2430 // these lambdas simplifies printing stat for vehicle line-by-line
2431 const auto print_stat_color = [&]( auto color, auto ...args ) {
2432 fold_and_print( w_stats, point( x[i], y[i] ), w[i], color, args... );
2433 i++;
2434 };
2435 const auto print_stat = [&]( auto ...args ) {
2436 print_stat_color( c_light_gray, args... );
2437 };
2438 // print empty line if condition not matches
2439 const auto print_stat_if = [&]( bool condition, auto ...args ) {
2440 if( condition ) {
2441 print_stat( args... );
2442 } else {
2443 i++;
2444 }
2445 };
2446
2447 if( is_aircraft ) {
2448 print_stat(
2449 _( "Air Safe/Top Speed: <color_light_green>%3d</color>/<color_light_red>%3d</color> %s" ),
2450 vel_to_int( veh->safe_rotor_velocity( false ) ),
2451 vel_to_int( veh->max_rotor_velocity( false ) ),
2452 velocity_units( VU_VEHICLE ) );
2453 print_stat(
2454 _( "Air Acceleration: <color_light_blue>%3d</color> %s/s" ),
2455 vel_to_int( veh->rotor_acceleration( false ) ),
2456 velocity_units( VU_VEHICLE ) );
2457 } else {
2458 if( is_ground ) {
2459 print_stat(
2460 _( "Safe/Top Speed: <color_light_green>%3d</color>/<color_light_red>%3d</color> %s" ),
2461 vel_to_int( veh->safe_ground_velocity( false ) ),
2462 vel_to_int( veh->max_ground_velocity( false ) ),
2463 velocity_units( VU_VEHICLE ) );
2464 // TODO: extract accelerations units to its own function
2465 print_stat(
2466 //~ /t means per turn
2467 _( "Acceleration: <color_light_blue>%3d</color> %s/s" ),
2468 vel_to_int( veh->ground_acceleration( false ) ),
2469 velocity_units( VU_VEHICLE ) );
2470 } else {
2471 i += 2;
2472 }
2473 if( is_boat ) {
2474 print_stat(
2475 _( "Water Safe/Top Speed: <color_light_green>%3d</color>/<color_light_red>%3d</color> %s" ),
2476 vel_to_int( veh->safe_water_velocity( false ) ),
2477 vel_to_int( veh->max_water_velocity( false ) ),
2478 velocity_units( VU_VEHICLE ) );
2479 // TODO: extract accelerations units to its own function
2480 print_stat(
2481 //~ /t means per turn
2482 _( "Water Acceleration: <color_light_blue>%3d</color> %s/s" ),
2483 vel_to_int( veh->water_acceleration( false ) ),
2484 velocity_units( VU_VEHICLE ) );
2485 } else {
2486 i += 2;
2487 }
2488 }
2489 print_stat(
2490 _( "Mass: <color_light_blue>%5.0f</color> %s" ),
2491 convert_weight( veh->total_mass() ), weight_units() );
2492 if( veh->has_part( "ROTOR" ) ) {
2493 // convert newton to kg.
2494 units::mass lift_as_mass = units::from_newton(
2495 veh->lift_thrust_of_rotorcraft( true ) );
2496 print_stat(
2497 _( "Maximum Lift: <color_light_blue>%5.0f</color> %s" ),
2498 convert_weight( lift_as_mass ),
2499 weight_units() );
2500 }
2501 if( is_boat ) {
2502 // convert newton to kg.
2503 units::mass buoyancy_as_mass = units::from_newton(
2504 veh->max_buoyancy() );
2505 print_stat(
2506 _( "Maximum Buoyancy: <color_light_blue>%5.0f</color> %s" ),
2507 convert_weight( buoyancy_as_mass ),
2508 weight_units() );
2509 }
2510 print_stat(
2511 _( "Cargo Volume: <color_light_blue>%s</color> / <color_light_blue>%s</color> %s" ),
2512 format_volume( total_cargo - free_cargo ),
2513 format_volume( total_cargo ), volume_units_abbr() );
2514 // Write the overall damage
2515 mvwprintz( w_stats, point( x[i], y[i] ), c_light_gray, _( "Status:" ) );
2516 x[i] += utf8_width( _( "Status:" ) ) + 1;
2517 print_stat_color( total_durability_color, total_durability_text );
2518
2519 print_stat( wheel_state_description( *veh ) );
2520
2521 //This lambda handles printing parts in the "Most damaged" and "Needs repair" cases
2522 //for the veh_interact ui
2523 const auto print_part = [&]( const std::string & str, int slot, vehicle_part * pt ) {
2524 mvwprintz( w_stats, point( x[slot], y[slot] ), c_light_gray, str );
2525 int iw = utf8_width( str ) + 1;
2526 return fold_and_print( w_stats, point( x[slot] + iw, y[slot] ), w[slot], c_light_gray, pt->name() );
2527 };
2528
2529 vehicle_part *mostDamagedPart = get_most_damaged_part();
2530 vehicle_part *most_repairable = get_most_repariable_part();
2531
2532 // Write the most damaged part
2533 if( mostDamagedPart && mostDamagedPart->damage_percent() ) {
2534 const std::string damaged_header = mostDamagedPart == most_repairable ?
2535 _( "Most damaged:" ) :
2536 _( "Most damaged (can't repair):" );
2537 i += print_part( damaged_header, i, mostDamagedPart );
2538 } else {
2539 i += 1;
2540 }
2541
2542 // Write the part that needs repair the most.
2543 if( most_repairable && most_repairable != mostDamagedPart ) {
2544 const std::string needsRepair = _( "Needs repair:" );
2545 i += print_part( needsRepair, i, most_repairable );
2546 } else {
2547 i += 1;
2548 }
2549
2550 print_stat(
2551 _( "Air drag: <color_light_blue>%5.2f</color>" ),
2552 veh->coeff_air_drag() );
2553
2554 print_stat_if( is_boat,
2555 _( "Water drag: <color_light_blue>%5.2f</color>" ),
2556 veh->coeff_water_drag() );
2557
2558 print_stat_if( is_ground,
2559 _( "Rolling drag: <color_light_blue>%5.2f</color>" ),
2560 veh->coeff_rolling_drag() );
2561
2562 print_stat(
2563 _( "Static drag: <color_light_blue>%5d</color>" ),
2564 veh->static_drag( false ) );
2565
2566 print_stat(
2567 _( "Offroad: <color_light_blue>%4d</color>%%" ),
2568 static_cast<int>( veh->k_traction( veh->wheel_area() *
2569 veh->average_or_rating() ) * 100 ) );
2570
2571 if( is_boat ) {
2572
2573 const double water_clearance = veh->water_hull_height() - veh->water_draft();
2574 std::string draft_string = water_clearance > 0 ?
2575 _( "Draft/Clearance:<color_light_blue>%4.2f</color>m/<color_light_blue>%4.2f</color>m" ) :
2576 _( "Draft/Clearance:<color_light_blue>%4.2f</color>m/<color_light_red>%4.2f</color>m" );
2577
2578 print_stat(
2579 draft_string.c_str(),
2580 veh->water_draft(), water_clearance );
2581 }
2582
2583 i = std::max( i, 2 * stats_h );
2584
2585 int fuel_gauge_start_y = y[i];
2586 if( display_object_ids ) {
2587 // Print vehicle type id over above gauges
2588 mvwprintz( w_stats, point( x[i], fuel_gauge_start_y ), c_light_blue,
2589 string_format( "[%s]", veh->type )
2590 );
2591 fuel_gauge_start_y++;
2592 }
2593
2594 // Print fuel percentage & type name only if it fits in the window, 10 is width of "E...F 100%"
2595 veh->print_fuel_indicators( w_stats, point( x[i], fuel_gauge_start_y ), fuel_index, true,
2596 ( x[ i ] + 10 < getmaxx( w_stats ) ),
2597 ( x[ i ] + 10 < getmaxx( w_stats ) ) );
2598
2599 if( install_info ) {
2600 const int details_w = getmaxx( w_details );
2601 // clear rightmost blocks of w_stats to avoid overlap
2602 int stats_col_2 = 33;
2603 int stats_col_3 = 65 + ( ( TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 4 );
2604 int clear_x = getmaxx( w_stats ) - details_w + 1 >= stats_col_3 ? stats_col_3 : stats_col_2;
2605 for( int i = 0; i < getmaxy( w_stats ); i++ ) {
2606 mvwhline( w_stats, point( clear_x, i ), ' ', getmaxx( w_stats ) - clear_x );
2607 }
2608 }
2609
2610 wnoutrefresh( w_stats );
2611}

2625/**
2626 * Prints the list of usable commands, and highlights the hotkeys used to activate them.
2627 */
2628void veh_interact::display_mode()
2629{
2630 werase( w_mode );
2631
2632 if( title.has_value() ) {
2633 nc_color title_col = c_light_gray;
2634 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-use-named-point-constants)
2635 print_colored_text( w_mode, point( 1, 0 ), title_col, title_col, title.value() );
2636 } else {
2637 size_t esc_pos = display_esc( w_mode );
2638
2639 // broken indentation preserved to avoid breaking git history for large number of lines
2640 const std::array<std::string, 11> actions = { {
2641 { _( "<i>nstall" ) },
2642 { _( "<r>epair" ) },
2643 { _( "<m>end" ) },
2644 { _( "re<f>ill" ) },
2645 { _( "rem<o>ve" ) },
2646 { _( "<s>iphon" ) },
2647 { _( "unloa<d>" ) },
2648 { _( "cre<w>" ) },
2649 { _( "sha<p>e" ) },
2650 { _( "r<e>name" ) },
2651 { _( "l<a>bel" ) },
2652 }
2653 };
2654
2655 const std::array<bool, std::tuple_size<decltype( actions )>::value> enabled = { {
2656 !cant_do( 'i' ),
2657 !cant_do( 'r' ),
2658 !cant_do( 'm' ),
2659 !cant_do( 'f' ),
2660 !cant_do( 'o' ),
2661 !cant_do( 's' ),
2662 !cant_do( 'd' ),
2663 !cant_do( 'w' ),
2664 !cant_do( 'p' ),
2665 true, // 'rename' is always available
2666 !cant_do( 'a' ),
2667 }
2668 };
2669
2670 int pos[std::tuple_size<decltype( actions )>::value + 1];
2671 pos[0] = 1;
2672 for( size_t i = 0; i < actions.size(); i++ ) {
2673 pos[i + 1] = pos[i] + utf8_width( actions[i] ) - 2;
2674 }
2675 int spacing = static_cast<int>( ( esc_pos - 1 - pos[actions.size()] ) / actions.size() );
2676 int shift = static_cast<int>( ( esc_pos - pos[actions.size()] - spacing *
2677 ( actions.size() - 1 ) ) / 2 ) - 1;
2678 for( size_t i = 0; i < actions.size(); i++ ) {
2679 shortcut_print( w_mode, point( pos[i] + spacing * i + shift, 0 ),
2680 enabled[i] ? c_light_gray : c_dark_gray, enabled[i] ? c_light_green : c_green,
2681 actions[i] );
2682 }
2683 }
2684 wnoutrefresh( w_mode );
2685}
2686
2687size_t veh_interact::display_esc( const catacurses::window &win )
2688{
2689 std::string backstr = _( "<ESC>-back" );
2690 // right text align
2691 size_t pos = getmaxx( win ) - utf8_width( backstr ) + 2;
2692 shortcut_print( win, point( pos, 0 ), c_light_gray, c_light_green, backstr );
2693 return pos;
2694}

2696/**
2697 * Draws the list of parts that can be mounted in the selected square. Used
2698 * when installing new parts.
2699 * @param pos The current cursor position in the list.
2700 * @param list The list to display parts from.
2701 * @param header Number of lines occupied by the list header
2702 */
2703void veh_interact::display_list( size_t pos, const std::vector<const vpart_info *> &list,
2704 const int header )
2705{
2706 werase( w_list );
2707 int lines_per_page = page_size - header;
2708 size_t page = pos / lines_per_page;
2709 for( size_t i = page * lines_per_page; i < ( page + 1 ) * lines_per_page && i < list.size(); i++ ) {
2710 const vpart_info &info = *list[i];
2711 int y = i - page * lines_per_page + header;
2712 mvwputch( w_list, point( 1, y ), info.color, special_symbol( info.sym ) );
2713 nc_color col = can_potentially_install( info ) ? c_white : c_dark_gray;
2714 trim_and_print( w_list, point( 3, y ), getmaxx( w_list ) - 3, pos == i ? hilite( col ) : col,
2715 info.name() );
2716 }
2717
2718 if( install_info ) {
2719 auto &tab_list = install_info->tab_list;
2720 auto &tab_list_short = install_info->tab_list_short;
2721 auto &tab = install_info->tab;
2722 // draw tab menu
2723 int tab_x = 0;
2724 for( size_t i = 0; i < tab_list.size(); i++ ) {
2725 std::string tab_name = ( tab == i ) ? tab_list[i] : tab_list_short[i]; // full name for selected tab
2726 tab_x += ( tab == i ); // add a space before selected tab
2727 draw_subtab( w_list, tab_x, tab_name, tab == i, false );
2728 tab_x += ( 1 + utf8_width( tab_name ) + ( tab ==
2729 i ) ); // one space padding and add a space after selected tab
2730 }
2731 }
2732 wnoutrefresh( w_list );
2733}
2734
2735/**
2736 * Used when installing parts.
2737 * Opens up w_details containing info for part currently selected in w_list.
2738 */
2739void veh_interact::display_details( const vpart_info *part )
2740{
2741 const int details_w = getmaxx( w_details );
2742
2743 werase( w_details );
2744
2745 wborder( w_details, LINE_XOXO, LINE_XOXO, LINE_OXOX, LINE_OXOX, LINE_OXXO, LINE_OOXX, LINE_XXOO,
2746 LINE_XOOX );
2747
2748 if( part == nullptr ) {
2749 wnoutrefresh( w_details );
2750 return;
2751 }
2752 // displays data in two columns
2753 int column_width = details_w / 2;
2754 int col_1 = 2;
2755 int col_2 = col_1 + column_width;
2756 int line = 0;
2757 bool small_mode = column_width < 20;
2758
2759 // line 0: part name
2760 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line ), details_w, c_light_green, part->name() );
2761
2762 // line 1: (column 1) durability (column 2) damage mod
2763 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line + 1 ), column_width, c_white,
2764 "%s: <color_light_gray>%d</color>",
2765 small_mode ? _( "Dur" ) : _( "Durability" ),
2766 part->durability );
2767 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_2, line + 1 ), column_width, c_white,
2768 "%s: <color_light_gray>%d%%</color>",
2769 small_mode ? _( "Dmg" ) : _( "Damage" ),
2770 part->dmg_mod );
2771
2772 // line 2: (column 1) weight (column 2) folded volume (if applicable)
2773 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line + 2 ), column_width, c_white,
2774 "%s: <color_light_gray>%.1f%s</color>",
2775 small_mode ? _( "Wgt" ) : _( "Weight" ),
2776 convert_weight( part->item->weight ),
2777 weight_units() );
2778 if( part->folded_volume != 0_ml ) {
2779 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_2, line + 2 ), column_width, c_white,
2780 "%s: <color_light_gray>%s %s</color>",
2781 small_mode ? _( "FoldVol" ) : _( "Folded Volume" ),
2782 format_volume( part->folded_volume ),
2783 volume_units_abbr() );
2784 }
2785
2786 // line 3: (column 1) size, bonus, wheel diameter (if applicable) (column 2) epower, wheel width (if applicable)
2787 if( part->size > 0_ml && part->has_flag( VPFLAG_CARGO ) ) {
2788 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line + 3 ), column_width, c_white,
2789 "%s: <color_light_gray>%s %s</color>",
2790 small_mode ? _( "Cap" ) : _( "Capacity" ),
2791 format_volume( part->size ), volume_units_abbr() );
2792 }
2793
2794 if( part->bonus > 0 ) {
2795 std::string label;
2796 if( part->has_flag( VPFLAG_SEATBELT ) ) {
2797 label = small_mode ? _( "Str" ) : _( "Strength" );
2798 } else if( part->has_flag( "HORN" ) ) {
2799 label = _( "Noise" );
2800 } else if( part->has_flag( "MUFFLER" ) ) {
2801 label = small_mode ? _( "NoisRed" ) : _( "Noise Reduction" );
2802 } else if( part->has_flag( VPFLAG_EXTENDS_VISION ) ) {
2803 label = _( "Range" );
2804 } else if( part->has_flag( VPFLAG_LIGHT ) || part->has_flag( VPFLAG_CONE_LIGHT ) ||
2805 part->has_flag( VPFLAG_WIDE_CONE_LIGHT ) ||
2806 part->has_flag( VPFLAG_CIRCLE_LIGHT ) || part->has_flag( VPFLAG_DOME_LIGHT ) ||
2807 part->has_flag( VPFLAG_AISLE_LIGHT ) || part->has_flag( VPFLAG_EVENTURN ) ||
2808 part->has_flag( VPFLAG_ODDTURN ) || part->has_flag( VPFLAG_ATOMIC_LIGHT ) ) {
2809 label = _( "Light" );
2810 }
2811
2812 if( !label.empty() ) {
2813 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line + 3 ), column_width, c_white,
2814 "%s: <color_light_gray>%d</color>", label,
2815 part->bonus );
2816 }
2817 }
2818
2819 if( part->has_flag( VPFLAG_WHEEL ) ) {
2820 // Note: there is no guarantee that whl is non-empty!
2821 const cata::value_ptr<islot_wheel> &whl = part->item->wheel;
2822 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line + 3 ), column_width, c_white,
2823 "%s: <color_light_gray>%d\"</color>",
2824 small_mode ? _( "Dia" ) : _( "Wheel Diameter" ),
2825 whl ? whl->diameter : 0 );
2826 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_2, line + 3 ), column_width, c_white,
2827 "%s: <color_light_gray>%d\"</color>",
2828 small_mode ? _( "Wdt" ) : _( "Wheel Width" ),
2829 whl ? whl->width : 0 );
2830 }
2831
2832 if( part->epower != 0 ) {
2833 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_2, line + 3 ), column_width, c_white,
2834 "%s: <color_light_gray>%+4d</color>",
2835 small_mode ? _( "Epwr" ) : _( "Electric Power" ),
2836 part->epower );
2837 }
2838
2839 // line 4 [horizontal]: fuel_type (if applicable)
2840 // line 4 [vertical/hybrid]: (column 1) fuel_type (if applicable) (column 2) power (if applicable)
2841 // line 5 [horizontal]: power (if applicable)
2842 if( !part->fuel_type.is_null() ) {
2843 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line + 4 ), column_width,
2844 c_white, _( "Charge: <color_light_gray>%s</color>" ),
2845 item::nname( part->fuel_type ) );
2846 }
2847 int part_consumption = part->energy_consumption;
2848 if( part_consumption != 0 ) {
2849 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_2, line + 4 ), column_width, c_white,
2850 _( "Drain: <color_light_gray>%+8d</color>" ), -part_consumption );
2851 }
2852
2853 // line 5 [vertical/hybrid] flags
2854 std::vector<std::string> flags = { { "OPAQUE", "OPENABLE", "BOARDABLE" } };
2855 std::vector<std::string> flag_labels = { { _( "opaque" ), _( "openable" ), _( "boardable" ) } };
2856 std::string label;
2857 for( size_t i = 0; i < flags.size(); i++ ) {
2858 if( part->has_flag( flags[i] ) ) {
2859 label += ( label.empty() ? "" : " " ) + flag_labels[i];
2860 }
2861 }
2862 // 6 [horizontal]: (column 1) flags (column 2) battery capacity (if applicable)
2863 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line + 5 ), details_w, c_yellow, label );
2864
2865 if( part->fuel_type == itype_battery && !part->has_flag( VPFLAG_ENGINE ) &&
2866 !part->has_flag( VPFLAG_ALTERNATOR ) ) {
2867 const cata::value_ptr<islot_magazine> &battery = part->item->magazine;
2868 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_2, line + 5 ), column_width, c_white,
2869 "%s: <color_light_gray>%8d</color>",
2870 small_mode ? _( "BatCap" ) : _( "Battery Capacity" ),
2871 battery->capacity );
2872 } else {
2873 int part_power = part->power;
2874 if( part_power == 0 ) {
2875 part_power = item( part->item ).engine_displacement();
2876 }
2877 if( part_power != 0 ) {
2878 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_2, line + 5 ), column_width, c_white,
2879 _( "Power: <color_light_gray>%+8d</color>" ), part_power );
2880 }
2881 }
2882
2883 wnoutrefresh( w_details );
2884}
2885
2886void veh_interact::count_durability()
2887{
2888 const vehicle_part_range vpr = veh->get_all_parts();
2889 int qty = std::accumulate( vpr.begin(), vpr.end(), 0,
2890 []( int lhs, const vpart_reference & rhs ) {
2891 return lhs + std::max( rhs.part().base.damage(), 0 );
2892 } );
2893
2894 int total = std::accumulate( vpr.begin(), vpr.end(), 0,
2895 []( int lhs, const vpart_reference & rhs ) {
2896 return lhs + rhs.part().base.max_damage();
2897 } );
2898
2899 int pct = total ? 100 * qty / total : 0;
2900
2901 if( pct < 5 ) {
2902 total_durability_text = _( "like new" );
2903 total_durability_color = c_light_green;
2904
2905 } else if( pct < 33 ) {
2906 total_durability_text = _( "dented" );
2907 total_durability_color = c_yellow;
2908
2909 } else if( pct < 66 ) {
2910 total_durability_text = _( "battered" );
2911 total_durability_color = c_magenta;
2912
2913 } else if( pct < 100 ) {
2914 total_durability_text = _( "wrecked" );
2915 total_durability_color = c_red;
2916
2917 } else {
2918 total_durability_text = _( "destroyed" );
2919 total_durability_color = c_dark_gray;
2920 }
2921}
2922
2923void act_vehicle_siphon( vehicle *veh )
2924{
2925 std::vector<itype_id> fuels;
2926 bool has_liquid = false;
2927 for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh->get_any_parts( VPFLAG_FLUIDTANK ) ) {
2928 if( vp.part().get_base().contents_made_of( LIQUID ) ) {
2929 has_liquid = true;
2930 break;
2931 }
2932 }
2933 if( !has_liquid ) {
2934 add_msg( m_info, _( "The vehicle has no liquid fuel left to siphon." ) );
2935 return;
2936 }
2937
2938 std::string title = _( "Select tank to siphon:" );
2939 auto sel = []( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
2940 return pt.is_tank() && pt.get_base().contents_made_of( LIQUID );
2941 };
2942 vehicle_part &tank = veh_interact::select_part( *veh, sel, title );
2943 if( tank ) {
2944 const item &base = tank.get_base();
2945 const int idx = veh->find_part( base );
2946 item liquid( base.contents.back() );
2947 const int liq_charges = liquid.charges;
2948 if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid( liquid, nullptr, 1, nullptr, veh, idx ) ) {
2949 veh->drain( idx, liq_charges - liquid.charges );
2950 veh->invalidate_mass();
2951 }
2952 }
2953}
2954
2955void act_vehicle_unload_fuel( vehicle *veh )
2956{
2957 std::vector<itype_id> fuels;
2958 for( auto &e : veh->fuels_left() ) {
2959 if( e.first == fuel_type_battery || e.first->phase != SOLID ) {
2960 // This skips battery and plutonium cells
2961 continue;
2962 }
2963 fuels.push_back( e.first );
2964 }
2965 if( fuels.empty() ) {
2966 add_msg( m_info, _( "The vehicle has no solid fuel left to remove." ) );
2967 return;
2968 }
2969 itype_id fuel;
2970 if( fuels.size() > 1 ) {
2971 uilist smenu;
2972 smenu.text = _( "Remove what?" );
2973 for( size_t i = 0; i < fuels.size(); i++ ) {
2974 const itype_id &fuel = fuels[i];
2975 if( fuel == itype_plut_cell && veh->fuel_left( fuel ) < PLUTONIUM_CHARGES ) {
2976 continue;
2977 }
2978 smenu.entries.emplace_back( uilist_entry( item::nname( fuel ) )
2979 .with_retval( static_cast<int>( i ) ) );
2980 }
2981 smenu.query();
2982 if( smenu.ret < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( smenu.ret ) >= fuels.size() ) {
2983 add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
2984 return;
2985 }
2986 fuel = fuels[smenu.ret];
2987 } else {
2988 fuel = fuels.front();
2989 }
2990
2991 int qty = veh->fuel_left( fuel );
2992 if( fuel == itype_plut_cell ) {
2993 if( qty / PLUTONIUM_CHARGES == 0 ) {
2994 add_msg( m_info, _( "The vehicle has no fully charged plutonium cells." ) );
2995 return;
2996 }
2997 item plutonium( fuel, calendar::turn, qty / PLUTONIUM_CHARGES );
2998 add_msg( m_info, _( "You unload %s from the vehicle." ), plutonium.display_name() );
2999 veh->drain( fuel, qty - ( qty % PLUTONIUM_CHARGES ) );
3000 g->u.i_add_or_drop( plutonium );
3001 } else {
3002 item solid_fuel( fuel, calendar::turn, qty );
3003 add_msg( m_info, _( "You unload %s from the vehicle." ), solid_fuel.display_name() );
3004 veh->drain( fuel, qty );
3005 g->u.i_add_or_drop( solid_fuel );
3006 }
3007}

3009/**
3010 * Called when the activity timer for installing parts, repairing, etc times
3011 * out and the action is complete.
3012 */
3013void veh_interact::complete_vehicle( player &p )
3014{
3015 if( p.activity.values.size() < 7 ) {
3016 debugmsg( "Invalid activity ACT_VEHICLE values:%d", p.activity.values.size() );
3017 return;
3018 }
3019
3020 map &here = get_map();
3021 optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( here.getlocal( tripoint( p.activity.values[0],
3022 p.activity.values[1], p.activity.values[7] ) ) );
3023 if( !vp ) {
3024 // so the vehicle could have lost some of its parts from other NPCS works during this player/NPCs activity.
3025 // check the vehicle points that were stored at beginning of activity.
3026 if( !p.activity.coord_set.empty() ) {
3027 for( const auto pt : p.activity.coord_set ) {
3028 vp = here.veh_at( here.getlocal( pt ) );
3029 if( vp ) {
3030 break;
3031 }
3032 }
3033 }
3034 // check again, to see if it really is a case of vehicle gone missing.
3035 if( !vp ) {
3036 debugmsg( "Activity ACT_VEHICLE: vehicle not found" );
3037 return;
3038 }
3039 }
3040 vehicle *const veh = &vp->vehicle();
3041
3042 point d( p.activity.values[4], p.activity.values[5] );
3043 int vehicle_part = p.activity.values[6];
3044 const vpart_id part_id( p.activity.str_values[0] );
3045
3046 const vpart_info &vpinfo = part_id.obj();
3047
3048 // cmd = Install Repair reFill remOve Siphon Unload reName relAbel
3049 switch( static_cast<char>( p.activity.index ) ) {
3050 case 'i': {
3051 const inventory &inv = p.crafting_inventory();
3052
3053 const auto reqs = vpinfo.install_requirements();
3054 if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component ) ) {
3055 add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't meet the requirements to install the %s." ), vpinfo.name() );
3056 break;
3057 }
3058
3059 // consume items extracting a match for the parts base item
3060 item base;
3061 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
3062 for( auto &obj : p.consume_items( e, 1, is_crafting_component ) ) {
3063 if( obj.typeId() == vpinfo.item ) {
3064 base = obj;
3065 }
3066 }
3067 }
3068 if( base.is_null() ) {
3069 if( !p.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) ) {
3070 add_msg( m_info, _( "Could not find base part in requirements for %s." ), vpinfo.name() );
3071 break;
3072 } else {
3073 base = item( vpinfo.item );
3074 }
3075 }
3076
3077 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
3078 p.consume_tools( e );
3079 }
3080
3081 p.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
3082
3083 int partnum = !base.is_null() ? veh->install_part( d, part_id,
3084 std::move( base ) ) : -1;
3085 if( partnum < 0 ) {
3086 debugmsg( "complete_vehicle install part fails dx=%d dy=%d id=%s", d.x, d.y, part_id.c_str() );
3087 break;
3088 }
3089
3090 // Need map-relative coordinates to compare to output of look_around.
3091 // Need to call coord_translate() directly since it's a new part.
3092 const point q = veh->coord_translate( d );
3093
3094 if( vpinfo.has_flag( VPFLAG_CONE_LIGHT ) ||
3095 vpinfo.has_flag( VPFLAG_WIDE_CONE_LIGHT ) ||
3096 vpinfo.has_flag( VPFLAG_HALF_CIRCLE_LIGHT ) ) {
3097 // Stash offset and set it to the location of the part so look_around will start there.
3098 const tripoint old_view_offset = p.view_offset;
3099 const tripoint offset = veh->global_pos3() + q;
3100 p.view_offset = offset - p.pos();
3101
3102 point delta;
3103 do {
3104 popup( _( "Press space, choose a facing direction for the new %s and confirm with enter." ),
3105 vpinfo.name() );
3106 const cata::optional<tripoint> chosen = g->look_around();
3107 if( !chosen ) {
3108 continue;
3109 }
3110 delta = ( *chosen - offset ).xy();
3111 // atan2 only gives reasonable values when delta is not all zero
3112 } while( delta == point_zero );
3113
3114 // Restore previous view offsets.
3115 p.view_offset = old_view_offset;
3116
3117 units::angle dir = normalize( atan2( delta ) - veh->face.dir() );
3118
3119 veh->part( partnum ).direction = dir;
3120 }
3121
3122 const tripoint vehp = veh->global_pos3() + tripoint( q, 0 );
3123 // TODO: allow boarding for non-players as well.
3124 player *const pl = g->critter_at<player>( vehp );
3125 if( vpinfo.has_flag( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE ) && pl ) {
3126 g->m.board_vehicle( vehp, pl );
3127 }
3128
3129 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You install a %1$s into the %2$s." ), veh->part( partnum ).name(),
3130 veh->name );
3131
3132 for( const auto &sk : vpinfo.install_skills ) {
3133 p.practice( sk.first, veh_utils::calc_xp_gain( vpinfo, sk.first, p ) );
3134 }
3135 here.add_vehicle_to_cache( veh );
3136 break;
3137 }
3138
3139 case 'r': {
3140 veh_utils::repair_part( *veh, veh->part( vehicle_part ), p );
3141 break;
3142 }
3143
3144 case 'f': {
3145 if( p.activity.targets.empty() || !p.activity.targets.front() ) {
3146 debugmsg( "Activity ACT_VEHICLE: missing refill source" );
3147 break;
3148 }
3149
3150 item_location &src = p.activity.targets.front();
3151 struct vehicle_part &pt = veh->part( vehicle_part );
3152 if( pt.is_tank() && src->is_container() && !src->contents.empty() ) {
3153
3154 pt.base.fill_with( src->contents.front() );
3155 src->on_contents_changed();
3156
3157 if( pt.ammo_remaining() != pt.ammo_capacity() ) {
3158 //~ 1$s vehicle name, 2$s tank name
3159 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You refill the %1$s's %2$s." ), veh->name, pt.name() );
3160 } else {
3161 //~ 1$s vehicle name, 2$s tank name
3162 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You completely refill the %1$s's %2$s." ), veh->name, pt.name() );
3163 }
3164
3165 if( src->contents.front().charges == 0 ) {
3166 src->remove_item( src->contents.front() );
3167 } else {
3168 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "There's some left over!" ) );
3169 }
3170
3171 } else if( pt.is_fuel_store() ) {
3172 auto qty = src->charges;
3173 pt.base.reload( p, std::move( src ), qty );
3174
3175 //~ 1$s vehicle name, 2$s reactor name
3176 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You refuel the %1$s's %2$s." ), veh->name, pt.name() );
3177
3178 } else {
3179 debugmsg( "vehicle part is not reloadable" );
3180 break;
3181 }
3182
3183 veh->invalidate_mass();
3184 break;
3185 }
3186
3187 case 'o': {
3188 const inventory &inv = p.crafting_inventory();
3189 if( vehicle_part >= veh->part_count() ) {
3190 vehicle_part = veh->get_next_shifted_index( vehicle_part, p );
3191 if( vehicle_part == -1 ) {
3192 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %s has already been removed by someone else." ),
3193 vpinfo.name() );
3194 return;
3195 }
3196 }
3197 const auto reqs = vpinfo.removal_requirements();
3198 if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component ) ) {
3199 add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't meet the requirements to remove the %s." ), vpinfo.name() );
3200 break;
3201 }
3202 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
3203 p.consume_items( e, 1, is_crafting_component );
3204 }
3205 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
3206 p.consume_tools( e );
3207 }
3208
3209 p.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
3210
3211 // This will be a list of all the items which arise from this removal.
3212 std::list<item> resulting_items;
3213
3214 // First we get all the contents of the part
3215 vehicle_stack contents = veh->get_items( vehicle_part );
3216 resulting_items.insert( resulting_items.end(), contents.begin(), contents.end() );
3217 contents.clear();
3218
3219 // Power cables must remove parts from the target vehicle, too.
3220 if( veh->part_flag( vehicle_part, "POWER_TRANSFER" ) ) {
3221 veh->remove_remote_part( vehicle_part );
3222 }
3223 if( veh->is_towing() || veh->is_towed() ) {
3224 std::cout << "vehicle is towing/towed" << std::endl;
3225 vehicle *other_veh = veh->is_towing() ? veh->tow_data.get_towed() : veh->tow_data.get_towed_by();
3226 if( other_veh ) {
3227 std::cout << "other veh exists" << std::endl;
3228 other_veh->remove_part( other_veh->part_with_feature( other_veh->get_tow_part(), "TOW_CABLE",
3229 true ) );
3230 other_veh->tow_data.clear_towing();
3231 }
3232 veh->tow_data.clear_towing();
3233 }
3234 bool broken = veh->part( vehicle_part ).is_broken();
3235
3236 if( broken ) {
3237 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You remove the broken %1$s from the %2$s." ),
3238 veh->part( vehicle_part ).name(), veh->name );
3239 } else {
3240 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You remove the %1$s from the %2$s." ),
3241 veh->part( vehicle_part ).name(), veh->name );
3242 }
3243
3244 if( !broken ) {
3245 resulting_items.push_back( veh->part( vehicle_part ).properties_to_item() );
3246 for( const auto &sk : vpinfo.install_skills ) {
3247 // removal is half as educational as installation
3248 p.practice( sk.first, veh_utils::calc_xp_gain( vpinfo, sk.first, p ) / 2 );
3249 }
3250
3251 } else {
3252 auto pieces = veh->part( vehicle_part ).pieces_for_broken_part();
3253 resulting_items.insert( resulting_items.end(), pieces.begin(), pieces.end() );
3254 }
3255
3256 if( veh->part_count() < 2 ) {
3257 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You completely dismantle the %s." ), veh->name );
3258 p.activity.set_to_null();
3259 here.destroy_vehicle( veh );
3260 here.reset_vehicle_cache( );
3261 } else {
3262 point mount = veh->part( vehicle_part ).mount;
3263 const tripoint &part_pos = veh->global_part_pos3( vehicle_part );
3264 veh->remove_part( vehicle_part );
3265 // part_removal_cleanup calls refresh, so parts_at_relative is valid
3266 veh->part_removal_cleanup();
3267 if( veh->parts_at_relative( mount, true ).empty() ) {
3268 get_map().clear_vehicle_point_from_cache( veh, part_pos );
3269 }
3270 }
3271 // This will be part of an NPC "job" where they need to clean up the acitivty items afterwards
3272 if( p.is_npc() ) {
3273 for( item &it : resulting_items ) {
3274 it.set_var( "activity_var", p.name );
3275 }
3276 }
3277 // Finally, put all the results somewhere (we wanted to wait until this
3278 // point because we don't want to put them back into the vehicle part
3279 // that just got removed).
3280 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( p, item_drop_reason::deliberate, resulting_items );
3281 break;
3282 }
3283 }
3284 p.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
3285}
